Francais: Les fils de Benjamin se rallièrent à la suite d'Abner et, réunis en un seul corps d'armée, ils s'arrêtèrent au sommet d'une colline.
Anglais: And the children of Benjamin gathered themselves together after Abner, and became one troop, and stood on the top of an hill.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Benyamin mok yam tuwsiya, tap kuɗ Abner, nisi lak kulo'o kay jiŋiliŋŋa.
Bulu: Ane bone be Bényamin be nga ke mvuse Abnér be bo ngume nsamba a tebe abôbône nkôle éziñ.
Guiziga: Soje ngi Benjameŋhey a kusom ngasl ngasl a duba Abner, a cifam a hirnga muwã.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Benyamin mooɓti, ɓiɗɗotiri ɓaawo Abineer, ɓe ɗon ndari dow hoore towndiire man.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Benyamin mooɓti, ɓiɗɗotiri ɓaawo Abineer, ɓe ɗon ndari dow hoore towndiire man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be Bɛnjamin mɔi̧a ŋmaa kpɔk duk ɗoŋ Abnɛr, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ɛ̀ yor zu ŋma kaya.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be Bɛnjamin mɔi̧a ŋmaa kpɔk duk ɗoŋ Abnɛr, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ɛ̀ yor zu ŋma kaya.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsene ka sewajɛa ka Bɛnjamɛn sha geva yitea Abnɛr, kantəsləte ghəa ghweme.
Tupurri: Jar ni Benjame raw wo tay see äaara wer Abner, tay wo go see kaçaçra doälog ta'a, day wo wo lagge ti tipeçeçge huuli po.

Francais: Abner appela Joab et dit: « L'épée dévorera-t-elle toujours? Ne sais-tu pas qu'il y aura de l'amertume à la fin? Jusques à quand attendras-tu à dire au peuple de cesser de poursuivre ses frères? »
Anglais: Then Abner called to Joab, and said, Shall the sword devour for ever? knowest thou not that it will be bitterness in the latter end? how long shall it be then, ere thou bid the people return from following their brethren?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abner yi Yowab nam di'e: Kew-gaferaŋa ma cal dok-dok su? Naŋ may wi ala yorta ma li bugol kayni ɗisu? Naŋ ma di tam sumun ala nisi ma digiɗ guro-biyosin loɗi ɗawn lancitige?
Bulu: Eyoñe te Abnér a nga loone Yôab a jô na: Ye nkpwaté mekôn wo ye ke ôsu a wôé éyoñ ése? Ye ô nji yeme na jame te da ye man a beta ôlun? Wo ye tabe a kui éyoñ évé te jô bôte na be bo te beta tôñe bobenyañ?
Guiziga: Abner a tila mi da Zoˀap, a ɓaŋ: «Ki wuɗ maslalam a zuma mizli ko mbak le ta si kwa? Kiɗa mi naŋ i ndurɓo hiri na, ki si na ta kwa? Ki sa ɓa mizli ɗikeye, a sa pulaka sipi sukum taŋhay nder nder na ti vunaka?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abineer ewni Yo'ab: “A yiɗi kaafahi nattina yimɓe haa foroy na? Malla a anndaa no timmoode maajum hallirta? Ndey umrata yimɓe ma ɓe acca taasnugo banndiraaɓe muuɗum'en?”
Fulfulde_DC: Abineer ewni Yo'ab: “A yiɗi kaafahi nattina yimɓe haa foroy na? Malla a anndaa no timmoode maajum hallirta? Ndey umrata yimɓe ma ɓe acca taasnugo banndiraaɓe muuɗum'en?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abnɛr saa Jɔab, ɓɛɛ ak a̧: «Gba-paa beka kaɗi gbɛɛ bíí ɓɔna nde? Mɛ́ íŋ ndé mɔ‘i tɛ kaɗi nɛ ɗaŋ-a na nde? Mɛ pɛm nɛ ge mɛ dor o wi nɔ'ɔ tɛ ndaka o nya-wa gbɛ nɛnɛ ge nde?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abnɛr saa Jɔab, ɓɛɛ ak a̧: «Gba-paa beka kaɗi gbɛɛ bíí ɓɔna nde? Mɛ́ íŋ ndé mɔ‘i tɛ kaɗi nɛ ɗaŋ-a na nde? Mɛ pɛm nɛ ge mɛ dor o wi nɔ'ɔ tɛ ndaka o nya-wa gbɛ nɛnɛ ge nde?»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Abnɛr sha Zhowab: «Mpa shɛ yatempa mə kajive kajive kezha zamte ghə ɓəmə na? Keɗepe na ndiremike tekiɗi ŋkɛ wəka? Wa yaneghe na nda ɗema fɛake ka sewajɛa ŋa kekeka ka menəhɛ nci wa?»
Tupurri: Abner kal ëe Jowab day gano: Moslamn joñ ge mbe tum car jar so yawla? Ndo bay de koge ga aà äo' ge ti go diñ de lawge wa yawla? Ndo gor ge na hun ëa so ga ndo wii jarn ga aà mo nii wo heçeçre äaaran wo wa so mo la?

Francais: Joab répondit: « Aussi vrai que Dieu est vivant! Si tu n'avais pas parlé, le peuple n'aurait pas cessé avant demain matin de poursuivre chacun son frère. »
Anglais: And Joab said, As God liveth, unless thou hadst spoken, surely then in the morning the people had gone up every one from following his brother.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yowab hot dita: Lawn ka iriya, la naŋ di diyɗi, ta-ta goy grawt kaw numa ka digiɗgiya.
Bulu: Nde Yôab a nga yalane na: Ane Zambe a vee! Nge ô nji ye Kobô, bôt be nga ye telé mewosane mametyé, môt ase a jôkéʼé monyañ.
Guiziga: Zoˀap a ɓaŋ: «I ra ɓuw ti slimiɗ ngi Bumbulvuŋ misi ti siifa, da ki ɓi zleˀe ta na, sipi sukumuŋ minder nder hana, anta pul ta hã tipriki.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yo'ab wi'i: “Fakat bana Allah o geeto, to a wi'aayno ɗum, yimɓe am accataano taasnugo on haa jaŋngo fajiri.”
Fulfulde_DC: Yo'ab wi'i: “Fakat bana Allah o geeto, to a wi'aayno ɗum, yimɓe am accataano taasnugo on haa jaŋngo fajiri.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔab kifa nú: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ duk kpasa ga, kà mɛ tɔ̧ so wen'i na, bó nɛ́ o wi-biro kɔ‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ kaɗi ndaka o nya-wa na mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔab kifa nú: «Hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ duk kpasa ga, kà mɛ tɔ̧ so wen'i na, bó nɛ́ o wi-biro kɔ‘m tɛ̀ɛ́ kaɗi ndaka o nya-wa na mɔ sa̧ nɛnɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Zhowab: «Te sləa Shala nya le mpi, ma keɗema na kezlapete kala nya kezha sərə mpa ne, nza pa va masheke hendɛ nza mpa.»
Tupurri: Jowab kal ferge gano: Baa yañ mbe tenene! Ndo de waçaç waçaçre we la gaa no, jarn de men wo durgi na de jag toñ, wosela de hay mbe nii hen äen ëa.

Francais: Et Joab sonna de la trompette, et tout le peuple s'arrêta: ils ne poursuivirent plus Israël, et ils ne continuèrent pas à se battre.
Anglais: So Joab blew a trumpet, and all the people stood still, and pursued after Israel no more, neither fought they any more.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala Yowab buw togolomna, sumun kaf lakaya; nisi min digiɗ sa Israyel loɗi, nisi min tuɗ vok hiɗi duur loɗi.
Bulu: Ane Yôab a nga loñe toñ a bôte bese be nga tebe; be nji fe beta tôñe Israél a be nji fe ke ôsu a wosan e zañe jap.
Guiziga: Zoˀap a fi tulum. Mizli naŋhay a pulaka sipi Israyeleye, anta kiɗam vu mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o fuufi luwal konu. Yimɓe maako acci taasnugo Isra'iila'en, ɓe acci haɓre boo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o fuufi luwal konu. Yimɓe maako acci taasnugo Isra'iila'en, ɓe acci haɓre boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔab dɔma zak, ɓɛɛ o wi-biro yor, wa kaɗa ndaka o be  Israɛl ; wa bi ŋmaa ɓɔna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔab dɔma zak, ɓɛɛ o wi-biro yor, wa kaɗa ndaka o be  Israɛl ; wa bi ŋmaa ɓɔna.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Zhowab vɛte kwelɛghə, pa ka sewajɛa ŋkɛ sərəakɛ keka ŋkwa, nahe mpa.
Tupurri: Jowab raw 'waa coçoç, day jarn äuy kal wo lagge. Saara men nii Israyel wo lay. Men wo durgin lay.

Francais: Abner et ses gens, après avoir marché toute la nuit dans la Plaine, passèrent le Jourdain, traversèrent tout le Bithron, et arrivèrent à Mahanaïm.
Anglais: And Abner and his men walked all that night through the plain, and passed over Jordan, and went through all Bithron, and they came to Mahanaim.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abner hiɗi sumuna valam bur tuɗ hay fulda talal', nisi ɦaw Yordan kulo'o, nisi ɦaw Bitron kulo kafe kaw, bugolda nisi co hay Mahanayim.
Bulu: Abnér a bôte bé be nga wulu ngum alu nkôte si ya Araba; a be nga dañe Yordan, a jômôsô Bitron ase a kui Mahanayim.
Guiziga: Abner ati mizli naŋhaya, kap ngi duvuɗo, a ram tir sozo ngi mizaw Zurdeŋ. A tuwuɗaka Zurdeŋ. A ngiraka Bitroŋ kããk, hã ara ndilam a Mahanayime.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jemmaare nde'e fuu Abineer e yimɓe mum ta'i nder Araba. Nden ɓe eeri maayo Urdun, ɓe caali lesdi Bituruna fuu, ɓe ngari haa Mahanayim.
Fulfulde_DC: Jemmaare nde'e fuu Abineer e yimɓe mum ta'i nder Araba. Nden ɓe eeri maayo Urdun, ɓe caali lesdi Bituruna fuu, ɓe ngari haa Mahanayim.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abnɛr in o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ nɛ̀ zɛ ɓir nɛ Araba, ku nɛ Jurdɛn, ɓir nɛ Bitrɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa hɔ Mahanayim.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abnɛr in o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ̀ɛ́ nɔ nɛ̀ zɛ ɓir nɛ Araba, ku nɛ Jurdɛn, ɓir nɛ Bitrɔŋ, ɓɛɛ wa hɔ Mahanayim.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa yɛ Abnɛr le mbelia ŋkɛ kiɗimte viɗia shɛ kadzeghwa kwa zlərəa Zhəwrdɛŋe, pa hɛ jivenji te hələ, zlakemte Bitron ba'a ntsehe mbe Mahanayim.
Tupurri: Abner wo de jar äen na wo ti seele poëag äil Araba no. Saara kal cegaë Jurdeçeç go, caa wo Bitron wo go, wo wo go Mahanayim.

Francais: Joab aussi cessa de poursuivre Abner et rassembla tout le peuple; il manquait dix-neuf hommes des serviteurs de David, et Asaël.
Anglais: And Joab returned from following Abner: and when he had gathered all the people together, there lacked of David's servants nineteen men and Asahel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay hotta vi Yowab vun duur kayni, nam tok sumun kaf, sumuna vi David sum say kuɗsiɗi doogo yam zleeŋe, hiɗi Asayel kaw.
Bulu: Eyoñe te Yôab a nga bulane mvus ntôñan a nga tôñ Abnér a sulane bôte bese; bôt awôm a ébule ya bebo bisaé be David a Asaél.
Guiziga: Ti Zoˀap mupula sipa Abnere na, a kuso mizli gar. A wuzla gawla ngi Daviteye, mizli anta kuruˀ nga ngoltir waɗ Asayel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Yo'ab acci taasnugo ɓe, o mooɓti yimɓe maako. O tawi worɓe sappo e njoweenayo ngalaa ɗon, Asa'el boo walaaɗon,
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Yo'ab acci taasnugo ɓe, o mooɓti yimɓe maako. O tawi worɓe sappo e njoweenayo ngalaa ɗon, Asa'el boo walaaɗon,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔab kaɗa ndaka Abnɛr ɓɛɛ a̧ mɔi̧ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ. O bíí ko David nɛ fee nɛ́ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar, ká bá nɛ̀ Asahɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔab kaɗa ndaka Abnɛr ɓɛɛ a̧ mɔi̧ o wi-biro kɔ̧-a̧ lɛŋ. O bíí ko David nɛ fee nɛ́ ɓu-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar, ká bá nɛ̀ Asahɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sərəakɛ keka Abnɛr Zhowab, pa ŋkɛ tsenete mbelia ŋkɛ. Deke mbeli meŋe meslighəmbe ba'a Asayɛl nde ɗema hwa mbelia wəndə nya keya David.
Tupurri: Jowab men nii Abner le go mokay raw tay jarn le äuy. Jar gwa' go yoo weere joçoçre mani Dafid wo hwal ti kaawa'a, lan diñ Asayele.

Francais: Et les serviteurs de David avaient frappé à mort trois cent soixante hommes de Benjamin et des hommes d'Abner.
Anglais: But the servants of David had smitten of Benjamin, and of Abner's men, so that three hundred and threescore men died.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May sumuna vi David ci sumun kis-ɦidi hiɗi diram dok-karkiya kuɗ sumuna vi Benyamin hiɗi Abner.
Bulu: Ve bôte be David be nga wôé bôte ya Bényamin a Abnér mintete mila a mewôm mesaman.
Guiziga: Gawla ngi Daviteye, a kiɗam a wuzla mizli Benjameŋhey waɗ a wuzla mizli ngi Abnereye, skat skat makir ti kukur merkeɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: yimɓe Daawuda mbarino yimɓe Benyamin e yimɓe Abineer teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweego (360).
Fulfulde_DC: yimɓe Daawuda mbarino yimɓe Benyamin e yimɓe Abineer teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweego (360).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-biro ko David gbɛɛ o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin in o bíí ko Abnɛr gɔmŋmaa-taar nɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-biro ko David gbɛɛ o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin in o bíí ko Abnɛr gɔmŋmaa-taar nɛ ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama mbeli nyi keya David ne, zhili gwəmsə mahekene ba'a ŋkwaŋemsə mpəmte hɛ hwa ka Bɛnjamɛn le kweci sewajɛa Abnɛr.
Tupurri: Ama jar mani Dafid ii wo jar kiskis swa' wer jar Benjame wo de Abnere.

Francais: Ils emportèrent Asaël et l'enterrèrent dans le sépulcre de son père, qui est à Bethléem. Joab et ses hommes marchèrent toute la nuit, et ils arrivèrent à Hébron au point du jour.
Anglais: And they took up Asahel, and buried him in the sepulchre of his father, which was in Beth–lehem. And Joab and his men went all night, and they came to Hebron at break of day.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi sli Asayel, tuɗ pum hay zulda vi bulumu hay Betlehem. Yowab hiɗi sumuna valam bur tuɗ talal', hay li ma fatta day kayni, nisi co hay Hebron may.
Bulu: Be nga Kee Asaél a jame nye e Soñ ésaa e Bétléhém. Yôab a bôte bé be nga wulu ngum alu, éyoñe te be nga kui Ebroñ éyoñ éfufube tyé ja taté bo.
Guiziga: A zuɓaka vagay ngi Asayele, a raka ka ar zivi ngi cine a Betelyem. Akẽh na, Zoˀap ati mizli naŋhaya, kap ngi duvuɗo ar li ru. Yo li mira wun weh weh na, ara ndilam a Hebroŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe kooci ɓanndu Asa'el, ɓe uwi ndu haa Baytilaama nder yenaande baaba maako. Nden Yo'ab e yimɓe mum tokkitini jahaaŋgal muuɗum'en jemmaare fuu. Ɓe njotti Heburuun wakkati naaŋge ɗon fuɗa.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe kooci ɓanndu Asa'el, ɓe uwi ndu haa Baytilaama nder yenaande baaba maako. Nden Yo'ab e yimɓe mum tokkitini jahaaŋgal muuɗum'en jemmaare fuu. Ɓe njotti Heburuun wakkati naaŋge ɗon fuɗa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa baa Asahɛl sinɛ, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ɛ̀ gun a̧ kɔ̧ pɛsi-fio ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn Bɛtlɛhɛm. Jɔab in o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ zɛ nɛ zɛ, kà mɔ tɛ́ sa̧, ɓɛɛ wa hɔ sɛn Hebrɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa baa Asahɛl sinɛ, ɓɛɛ wa nɛ́ɛ̀ gun a̧ kɔ̧ pɛsi-fio ko dáà kɔ̧-a̧ sɛn Bɛtlɛhɛm. Jɔab in o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ zɛ nɛ zɛ, kà mɔ tɛ́ sa̧, ɓɛɛ wa hɔ sɛn Hebrɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli keleke wəndə kemte mtea Asayɛl kalamte kwa kwele ta yitenyɛ kwa Bɛtelɛhɛm. Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, hwencɛke ncɛke yɛ Zhowab le mbelia ŋkɛ kadzeghwa, hwa'a hɛ mbe Hɛbron yipə le kiɗi ta ŋkwa.
Tupurri: Saara kal mañ huli Asayel le, raw wo teege äe wo go ti tipale mani pan äen go Betlehem. Jowab wo de jar äen na wo ti seele poëage, saara wo laage Hebroñ de maga ngeel mañ le go mono.

Francais: La guerre fut longue entre la maison de Saül et la maison de David. David allait se fortifiant, et la maison de Saül allait s'affaiblissant.
Anglais: Now there was long war between the house of Saul and the house of David: but David waxed stronger and stronger, and the house of Saul waxed weaker and weaker.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Duur mus noŋ ta-ta jar jafna vi Sawul hiɗi jafna vi David. David ka muɗ dono vokomu vokomu suwa, may jafna vi Sawul ka muɗ maŋay suwa.
Bulu: Mewosan me nga tabe ayap e zañe nda bôte Saül a nda bôte David. Ve David a nga dañe dañe bo ngu, ve ba ya nda Saül be nga ke ke si.
Guiziga: Mizli ngi Sawuloy ati ngi Daviteye, a zikam ti gi vurumo le haɗa ar wala taŋ. Davit ara lum gidaŋ nga mbuŋ nga mbuŋ, amma mizli ngi Sawuloyo, ara hĩhĩyam ti hĩhĩy jaka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haɓre hakkunde yimɓe Sawulu e yimɓe Daawuda duuri. Semmbe yimɓe Daawuda ɗon ɓesdo ammaa yimɓe Sawulu ɗon tampa.
Fulfulde_DC: Haɓre hakkunde yimɓe Sawulu e yimɓe Daawuda duuri. Semmbe yimɓe Daawuda ɗon ɓesdo ammaa yimɓe Sawulu ɗon tampa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Biro duka ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ mgbara o bíí nutua ko Saul in o bíí nutua ko David. David ŋgai ŋgai siti, ɓɛɛ o bíí nutua ko Saul tir kɔ‘i tir si ɗɔɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Biro duka ɗoŋ-aa nyɛi̧ mgbara o bíí nutua ko Saul in o bíí nutua ko David. David ŋgai ŋgai siti, ɓɛɛ o bíí nutua ko Saul tir kɔ‘i tir si ɗɔɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe mpa ketemə kwele kwele kwelɛ yita ta Sawəl le yita ta David. Ma kazhɛre David berete ma ne, kadene berete ta ŋwalea Sawəl ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ.
Tupurri: Durgi ma ti holañ tiñ mani Sawuln wo de tiñ mani Dafidn ig debañ. Dafid hay tum de raw eegre äaara ama eegre jar ni Sawul hay wo tum hoorge lay.

Francais: Il naquit à David des fils à Hébron. Son premier-né fut Ammon, d'Achinoam de Jezraël;
Anglais: And unto David were sons born in Hebron: and his firstborn was Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: David vuɗ guro segena hay Hebron. Goor ma vuɗ jewna yum Amnon, vuɗum ti Akinowam ta Yisreelta;
Bulu: Bobefam be nga bialé David Ebroñ. Ntôle fame wé ô mbe Amnon, ba Ahinôam ya Yizrél be nga biaé nye;
Guiziga: Davit a yi ziriy le haɗa a Hebroŋ. Mangal naŋ modogomo i Amnoŋ. A ya ti Ahinoˀam, zuŋ Zisreyel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daawuda danyi ɓiɓɓe worɓe haa Heburuun. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Ahino'am mo Yisre'el danyani mo Amnon, afo maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Daawuda danyi ɓiɓɓe worɓe haa Heburuun. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Ahino'am mo Yisre'el danyani mo Amnon, afo maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David koo o bem sɛn Hebrɔŋ. Kaya-bem nɛ́ Amnɔŋ; nɛ́ Ahinɔam, zɔŋa Yizreɛl a̧ koa a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David koo o bem sɛn Hebrɔŋ. Kaya-bem nɛ́ Amnɔŋ; nɛ́ Ahinɔam, zɔŋa Yizreɛl a̧ koa a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa Hɛbron ne, kwele kwele yake ŋwale tezhili David. Pa yake Amnon, nde ghate ta wəzege ta ŋkɛ sawa hwa Ahinowam, wəzha ta ka Zhizrɛyɛl.
Tupurri: Dafid raw biñ weere wo Hebroñ ni. Jag mbarga äen diñ Amnon je ni Ahinowam may Jisreyel no,

Francais: le second Chéléab, d'Abigaïl de Carmel, femme de Nabal; le troisième Absalom, fils de Maaca, fille de Tholmaï, roi de Gessur;
Anglais: And his second, Chileab, of Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite; and the third, Absalom the son of Maacah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma ma'na yum Kiliyab, vuɗum ti Abigayil ta Karmelta, ti cata vi Nabal; ma ɦidina yum Absalom, goora vi Maaka, goota vi Talmay, mulla vi Gesur;
Bulu: nyô baa a mbe Kiléab, baa Abigayil, nga Nabal ya Karmel be nga biaé nye; nyô lale a mbe Absalom, e mona Maaka, ngone Talmayi, njô bôte ya Gésur;
Guiziga: Mucuw naŋ i Kilap, a ya ti Abigayel, ngwas ngi Nabal, mbur ngi ruwuy Karmel zleˀe, mimakir taŋ i Absalom, a ya ti Maˀaka, zuŋ ngi Talmay, buy ngi Gesur.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abigayel laatinooɗo debbo Nabal, danyani mo Kiliyabu, ɗiɗaɓo maako. Tataɓo boo Absalom, innde daada mum Ma'aka, ɓii Talmay, laamiiɗo Gesur.
Fulfulde_DC: Abigayel laatinooɗo debbo Nabal, danyani mo Kiliyabu, ɗiɗaɓo maako. Tataɓo boo Absalom, innde daada mum Ma'aka, ɓii Talmay, laamiiɗo Gesur.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Kilɛab; nɛ́ Abigail ko-oi Nabal be Karmɛl a̧ koo a̧. Taar-a nɛ́ Absalɔm; nɛ́ Maka boko-bem ko Talmai, wannu Gɛsur a̧ koo a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa nɛ́ Kilɛab; nɛ́ Abigail ko-oi Nabal be Karmɛl a̧ koo a̧. Taar-a nɛ́ Absalɔm; nɛ́ Maka boko-bem ko Talmai, wannu Gɛsur a̧ koo a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Kilab ya kakwa bake, sawa hwa Abigayil, male wedea Nabal nya kande Karmɛl. Absalom, kande maheke, sawa hwa Ma'aka, wəzha ta Talmay, mazea ka Gɛshəwr.
Tupurri: ma de äogn diñ Kileyab je ni Abigayel waçy mani Nabal je Karmel no, ma de swa'n diñ Absalon je ni Maaka may mani Talmay wañ Gesur no

Francais: le quatrième Adonias, fils de Haggith; le cinquième Saphathia, fils d'Abital,
Anglais: And the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith; and the fifth, Shephatiah the son of Abital;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma fiɗina mi Adoniya, vuɗum ti Haggit; ma vaslna mi Skefatiya, vuɗum ti Abital;
Bulu: nyô nyini a mbe Adôniya, e mona Agit; nyô tane a mbe Sefatia e mona Abital;
Guiziga: Mumufaɗ taŋ i Adoniya, a ya ti Agit, muzlum taŋ i Sefatiya, a ya ti Abital.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nayaɓo woni Adoniya, innde daada maako Haggit. Sefatiya woni njowaɓo, innde daada mum Abital.
Fulfulde_DC: Nayaɓo woni Adoniya, innde daada maako Haggit. Sefatiya woni njowaɓo, innde daada mum Abital.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Naar-a nɛ́ Adɔnias; nɛ́ Hagit a̧ koo a̧. Mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Sefatia; nɛ́ Abital a̧ koo a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Naar-a nɛ́ Adɔnias; nɛ́ Hagit a̧ koo a̧. Mɔɔrɔ-a nɛ́ Sefatia; nɛ́ Abital a̧ koo a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Adoniya ya kande wəfaɗe, sawa hwa Hagite sawa ŋkɛ. Shefatiya ya kande mcɛfe, sawa hwa Abital ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: ma de naan diñ Adonija je ni Hagid no, ma de dween diñ Sefatiya je ni Abital no

Francais: et le sixième Jéthraam, d'Egla, femme de David. Tels sont les fils qui naquirent à David à Hébron.
Anglais: And the sixth, Ithream, by Eglah David's wife. These were born to David in Hebron.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ma karkiyana mi Yitreyam, vuɗum ti Egla, cata vi David. Nisi kayni si sa David vuɗsi hay Hebronna.
Bulu: nyô saman a mbe Yitream, e mona Egla, nga David. Bana mbe be nga bialé Ebroñ.
Guiziga: Mimerkeɗ taŋ i Itreˀam, a ya ti Egla. Egla kwana i ngwas ngi buy. Hanayna i ziri ngi Davitey miya taŋ a Hebroŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Njoweegoojo Yitiriyam, Egila woni daada maako. Daawuda danyi ɓe fuu haa Heburuun.
Fulfulde_DC: Njoweegoojo Yitiriyam, Egila woni daada maako. Daawuda danyi ɓe fuu haa Heburuun.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Yitrɛam; nɛ́ Egla kóò ko David a̧ koo a̧. O bem nɛ David koo sɛn Hebrɔŋ lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-a nɛ́ Yitrɛam; nɛ́ Egla kóò ko David a̧ koo a̧. O bem nɛ David koo sɛn Hebrɔŋ lɛŋ nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Itrɛyam ya kande ŋkwaŋe, sawa hwa Ɛgla sawa ŋkɛ, ghenta perə ne, male ta meghe nde. Nyi ya kaŋwalea David nyi keya mbe Hɛbron.
Tupurri: ma de hiira'n diñ Yitreyam je ni Egla waçy mani Dafid no. Mona diñ jar maga Dafid biñ ra Hebroñ mono.

Francais: Pendant qu'il y avait guerre entre la maison de Saül et la maison de David, Abner se fortifiait dans la maison de Saül.
Anglais: And it came to pass, while there was war between the house of Saul and the house of David, that Abner made himself strong for the house of Saul.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma duur ka li jar jafna vi David hiɗi jafna vi Sawul kayni, Abner col dono'o kay jafna vi Sawul.
Bulu: Eyoñe bita bi mbe zañe ngame Saül a ngame David, Abnér a nga yeme ngu e ngame Saül,
Guiziga: Ti di vurum mira gi ar wala ngi mizli ngi Sawuloy ati mizli ngi Davitey na, Abner ara vula gidaŋ nga naŋ tir vay ngi Sawul.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Wakkati haɓre ɗonno tokki hakkunde saare Sawulu e saare Daawuda, baawɗe Abineer ɓesdi yeeso yeeso nder saare Sawulu.
Fulfulde_DC: Wakkati haɓre ɗonno tokki hakkunde saare Sawulu e saare Daawuda, baawɗe Abineer ɓesdi yeeso yeeso nder saare Sawulu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ̀ yaka ŋgimbi biro mgbara o bíí nutua ko Saul in ko David nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ŋgai ko Abnɛr daŋ daŋ siti zu o bíí ko Saul.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ̀ yaka ŋgimbi biro mgbara o bíí nutua ko Saul in ko David nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: ŋgai ko Abnɛr daŋ daŋ siti zu o bíí ko Saul.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa temə mpa kwelɛ mbelia Sawəl le mbelia David ne, pa Abnɛr ghwəɗə ghwəɗəyi meghea ŋkɛ mbe hwa mbelia Sawəl.
Tupurri: Ti wur maga durgi hay ti holañ tiñ mani Sawul wo de tiñ mani Dafid mono, Abner hay mbe tum de oole ngiñ wer tiñ mani Sawul no.

Francais: Or Saül avait eu une concubine, nommée Respha, fille d'Aia. Et Isboseth dit à Abner: « Pourquoi es-tu venu vers la concubine de mon père? »
Anglais: And Saul had a concubine, whose name was Rizpah, the daughter of Aiah: and Ish–bosheth said to Abner, Wherefore hast thou gone in unto my father's concubine?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Sawul ays irina, nam sli cat ta gorvota kepe ya' Rispa, na' ti goota vi Ayya. Is-Boset di tam Abner: Naŋ kal kuɗ cata ta gorvota vi bunu kay mige?
Bulu: Ve Saül a nga bili ébon jôé na Rispa, ngone Aya, nde Isbôsét a nga jô Abnér na: Amu jé ô maneya bômbô a ébon ésaa wom?
Guiziga: Sawulo, ngwas naŋ mangasl ada zleˀe, a zilaka Rispa, i zuŋ ngi Aya, ngi hin numuŋ ada na, Isebaˀal a mbiɗa hirnga da Abnere, a ɓaŋ: «Ka mihin ti ngwas mangasl ngi baha na ngi mike?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde go'o Isboset feli Abineer ngam daliila culaaɗo baaba maako Sawulu, innde culaaɗo oo Rispa ɓii Aya. O wi'i: “Koni mbaalduɗa bee culaaɗo baaba am?”
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde go'o Isboset feli Abineer ngam daliila culaaɗo baaba maako Sawulu, innde culaaɗo oo Rispa ɓii Aya. O wi'i: “Koni mbaalduɗa bee culaaɗo baaba am?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋma kóò ko Saul duka so, nin-a nɛ́ Rispa, boko-bem ko Aya. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Isbosɛt nɛɛ ak Abnɛr zu kóò‘i hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Wen ge mɛ ɔɔ in kóò ko dáà kɔ‘m ge?»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋma kóò ko Saul duka so, nin-a nɛ́ Rispa, boko-bem ko Aya. Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Isbosɛt nɛɛ ak Abnɛr zu kóò‘i hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Wen ge mɛ ɔɔ in kóò ko dáà kɔ‘m ge?»
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Sawəl kelete kwete male kwatera, sləa nta Rispa, wəzha ta Aya. Te ghena ta nta ne, ma ke Ishebal sha Abnɛr te kwete hɛ: «Wa raberə nda ɓelahe na le male ta yiteyɛ ɗa wa?»
Tupurri: Paga Sawul hay we de hoo nday äe po, ëu äe ga Rispa may mani Aya no. Day Is-Bosed kal riñ Abner gano: Wer mayse ga ndo wo see nday pan äin la?

Francais: Abner, très irrité des paroles d'Isboseth, répondit: « Suis-je un tête de chien appartenant à Juda? Aujourd'hui je montre de la faveur à la maison de Saül, ton père, à ses frères et à ses amis, et je ne t'ai point livré aux mains de David, et c'est aujourd'hui que tu me reproches une faute avec cette femme?
Anglais: Then was Abner very wroth for the words of Ish–bosheth, and said, Am I a dog's head, which against Judah do shew kindness this day unto the house of Saul thy father, to his brethren, and to his friends, and have not delivered thee into the hand of David, that thou chargest me to day with a fault concerning this woman?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abner dikam ɓulak ŋolo kay dita vi Is-Boset, nam hot dita: Nan mi yam diya kay gi diran kuɗ Yuda su? Vaydi kayni nan ka li ŋaata tam jafna vi Sawul buŋu, tam guro-biyomna hiɗi boniyomna, nan min vulaŋ goy hay ɓam Davidɗi, may vaydi naŋ lawan ɦiya kay kal ma nan kal kuɗ cata vi buŋŋa kay mige?
Bulu: Nde Abnér a nga dañe yaa amu mejô Isbôsét a nga kobô a jô na: Ye me ne mvu ja wôʼa bôte ya e nda bôt ésoo Saül bobenyañ a bemvôé bé, me boya mam mese na ô bo te ku e mo me David ve wo den wo komekane ma ajô ya minga nyô!
Guiziga: Abner micina mingiɓi hana kahana, a ji mevel haɗa ar Isebaˀala, a ɓaŋ: «Ani yi kiri ngi mizli Zudahay sukwa? Hã dana, ya teŋteŋ avu hay ngi cine ɗik Sawulo. Ya teŋteŋ avu sukum naŋhay ati ngama naŋhaya. Yi puluw mbak ɓa ki ci asi haŋ ngi Davite ta. Ani wurenna, ki wuɗ ki mbiɗiy hirnga asi ɓi ngi ngwas misenna!
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abineer ɓerni masin, o wi'i: “Mi zammboowo! Mi walaa amaana! Mi huuwani saare baaba ma Sawulu e banndiraaɓe muuɗum e soobiraaɓe muuɗum bee ɓernde am fuu. Mi ayni ma ngam taa nasta juuɗe Daawuda. Ammaa hannde a takkanammi haala debbo?
Fulfulde_DC: Abineer ɓerni masin, o wi'i: “Mi zammboowo! Mi walaa amaana! Mi huuwani saare baaba ma Sawulu e banndiraaɓe muuɗum e soobiraaɓe muuɗum bee ɓernde am fuu. Mi ayni ma ngam taa nasta juuɗe Daawuda. Ammaa hannde a takkanammi haala debbo?
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abnɛr kpaa ɗaŋsee tɛ wen'i ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi nɛ toyo ko Juda sɛka'm de mɔ hegɔ nde? Sɔsɔɔ, mi de nɛ mɔ nɛ mboozu sitɛ o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ Saul, sitɛ o nya-a̧ in o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt. Mi e mɛ ha̧ mɛ mɛ tik kɔ̧ er David na. Ɓɛɛ kinii, mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ha̧ tu̧u̧-see ha̧‘m wen zu kóò'ɛ!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abnɛr kpaa ɗaŋsee tɛ wen'i ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Mi nɛ toyo ko Juda sɛka'm de mɔ hegɔ nde? Sɔsɔɔ, mi de nɛ mɔ nɛ mboozu sitɛ o bíí nutua ko dáà kɔ-mɛ Saul, sitɛ o nya-a̧ in o sɛm kɔ̧-a̧ mbɛt. Mi e mɛ ha̧ mɛ mɛ tik kɔ̧ er David na. Ɓɛɛ kinii, mɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ ha̧ tu̧u̧-see ha̧‘m wen zu kóò'ɛ!
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa fate ghena nya Abnɛr ne, kwele kwele zhɛ nda wənəa ŋkɛ, ma ke: «Kelɛ 'ya nya keveyi geva kezha mbelia Zhəwda na? Pa tsetsenya 'ya kancɛ ɗe ta ɗa kaɗe mbelia meghe Sawəl yiteyɛ ŋa, kezha ka kesaka meghekɛ le yɛ ka mcɛhɛnyɛ, pɛtɛ menete ntsehwele 'ya ya shɛ na kateɗe kadzembe dzeve ta David, ma ɓeshi ne, kaŋele ɗa na te ghə male nya!
Tupurri: Jiili Abner raw caage go debañ wer waçaçre Is-Bosedn wo. Se kal ferge gano: Ndi na diñ ti way jar Juda wo yawla? Haçaç wara ndi mbi tum joñ de el see tiñ mani Sawul pan äo no, see heçeçre äen wo de bar äen wo, ndi haç mo go ne Dafid äi coo do gaa, day wara so ndo ya' ruu mege ti waçaçre waçy?

Francais: Que Dieu traite Abner dans toute sa rigueur, si je n'agis pas avec David selon ce que Yahweh lui a juré,
Anglais: So do God to Abner, and more also, except, as the  Lord  hath sworn to David, even so I do to him;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawn ma lan joo'o hiɗi dikam kafe, la nan li tam David ki Ma-Vatɗin yi va kalamu kay David naɗi;
Bulu: Ajô te Zambe a boʼo Abnér e jame di a beta fe beté dili nge bia David bi boo te bo avale Nti a nga kane David ngana,
Guiziga: Ya Abnere, gwat Buymisemuŋ miɓa da Davit ti hudum na, da yi ga ta na, anja Bumbulvuŋ a kutiy ti bonoy mukuyta wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo hiito yam bee caatal to mi waɗanaay Daawuda ko Jawmiraawo hunani mo,
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo hiito yam bee caatal to mi waɗanaay Daawuda ko Jawmiraawo hunani mo,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Shala menete ɗa wəsə kwa ndiremi kamtsehete ɗa zhɛkwa keɗema 'ya kamene nda ke David kala nya meɗeyi nda Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Daga Baa mo joñ Abner go de mopo doga äil äe da nono hayga ndi see we see Dafid do maga Baa hay haç' go ne Dafid no gaa mono.

Francais: en disant qu'il enlèverait la royauté de la maison de Saül, et qu'il établirait le trône de David sur Israël et sur Juda, depuis Dan jusqu'à Bersabée!
Anglais: To translate the kingdom from the house of Saul, and to set up the throne of David over Israel and over Judah, from Dan even to Beer–sheba.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay nam di ala nam ma jok mulda vi jafna vi Sawul mi David, ala nam min tun zlamda vi David kay Israyel hiɗi Yuda kafe, tun cawis hay Dan pa ta-ta hay Ber-Seba.
Bulu: a jôʼô na: Ma ye vaa éjôé e ndaa Saül a telé éto njôane David Israél a Yuda été, ataté Dañ a kui Birséba.
Guiziga: A ɓaŋ a sa tiɓa buyo tivi mizli ngi hay Sawuloyo, a sa cifi ti Davite, i buy ngi Israyel, ngi Zuda, zle a Daŋ sesẽŋ a Berseba.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: o wi'no o ɓortan saare Sawulu diga laamu, o waɗa Daawuda laamiiɗo dow Isra'iila e Yahuuda fuu, diga Dan haa yotto Biirsaba .”
Fulfulde_DC: o wi'no o ɓortan saare Sawulu diga laamu, o waɗa Daawuda laamiiɗo dow Isra'iila e Yahuuda fuu, diga Dan haa yotto Biirsaba .”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ na kemeɗeyi kezha kelemte meghe shave ki ghɛa Sawəl, kezha mene meghe David te ka Israyɛl tsagha te ka Zhəwda, slə mbe Dan hwa'a mbe Bɛrshɛba.»
Tupurri: AÀ hay haç' go ne hen ga se yaçaç wañ yañ le go do tiñ mani Sawul no, day se hay Dafid go ti paale wañ ti Israyel wo de Juda tï¡ï¡ le Dañ ka' le go Beer-Seba.

Francais: Isboseth ne put répondre un seul mot à Abner, parce qu'il le craignait.
Anglais: And he could not answer Abner a word again, because he feared him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Is-Boset min hot di va mi Abner kep noŋɗi, kay nam li nar kalamu.
Bulu: Isbôsét a nji bo ayoʼo ya yalane Abnér vʼajô da, amu a nga ko nye woñ.
Guiziga: Ko Isebaˀal a mbiɗaŋ mi pal gu ta, asi ara zluwun di haɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Isboset waawaay jaabaago Abineer koo wolde woore, ngam o huli mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Isboset waawaay jaabaago Abineer koo wolde woore, ngam o huli mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Isbosɛt hu̧i̧ géé nú ha̧ Abnɛr na, wen kíí Abnɛr de nɛ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Isbosɛt hu̧i̧ géé nú ha̧ Abnɛr na, wen kíí Abnɛr de nɛ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Shaŋe Ishebal kazhɛne nda ghena kwa nza ŋkɛ kaghazlənə ve.
Tupurri: Is-Bosed buñ jag go ne Abner ni gaa äuy werga aà hay joñ heçeçne do äe.

Francais: Abner envoya des messagers à David pour lui dire de sa part: « A qui est le pays? Fais ton alliance avec moi, et voici que ma main t'aidera pour tourner vers toi tout Israël. »
Anglais: And Abner sent messengers to David on his behalf, saying, Whose is the land? saying also, Make thy league with me, and, behold, my hand shall be with thee, to bring about all Israel unto thee.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abner cuk sumun tam David kay dum ala: Nagata na' vi gige? Vaŋ bono hiɗi nanu, nala nan ma gutaŋu kay muɗ mulda vi Israyel kaf goy maŋ naŋu.
Bulu: Ane Abnér a nga lôme David minlôman be jô nye na: Si é ne nyô za? Be Jô fe nye na: Boʼok élate jôé a ma: wo wom ô ne a wo mfaʼa ya dutu Israél ase be wo.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Abner a slin mizli ng'avu Davite ar slimiɗ naŋ, ɓa a ɓakaŋ: «Hirwuy i ngi waka? Jumˀay ati ya, ɓa i jinuw ngi jumo hirwuy Israyele gar ng'avu ka.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Abineer neli nelaaɓe haa Daawuda, o wi'i: “Naa a anndi mo mari baawɗe haa lesdi ndi na? Kadi haɓɓu alkawal bee am. Juŋngo am wondan bee maaɗa haa mi waylitane Isra'iila fuu.”
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Abineer neli nelaaɓe haa Daawuda, o wi'i: “Naa a anndi mo mari baawɗe haa lesdi ndi na? Kadi haɓɓu alkawal bee am. Juŋngo am wondan bee maaɗa haa mi waylitane Isra'iila fuu.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Abnɛr toma o betom nɛnɛ ha̧ David nɛ̀ nin wi. A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Nù nɛ́ ko o? Mɛ̀ nɔ́ tɔk in am, ɓɛɛ mi gbaka mɛ mɔi̧ nɛ̀ o be  Israɛl  a ɗoŋ mɛ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Abnɛr toma o betom nɛnɛ ha̧ David nɛ̀ nin wi. A̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Nù nɛ́ ko o? Mɛ̀ nɔ́ tɔk in am, ɓɛɛ mi gbaka mɛ mɔi̧ nɛ̀ o be  Israɛl  a ɗoŋ mɛ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma tagha ne, pa Abnɛr ghwenakɛ nda mɛ ke David kageze shɛ: «Ŋa wa hɛɗi nya wa? Menete ɓə jikə geva, kezha kemane ŋa 'ya katsene pɛtɛa ka Israyɛl kwa sebe ta ŋa.»
Tupurri: Abner raw laa jar wo see Dafid ma riñgi äe gano: Sirn na ma wo ba pa la? Se wiin wo pa gano: Tay jag go de äi ni ndi kay mo yañ ma fer Israyel wo le wer äo.

Francais: Il répondit: « Bien! Je ferai alliance avec toi; mais je te demande une chose, c'est que tu ne voies pas ma face sans m'amener Michol, fille de Saül, lorsque tu viendras pour voir ma face. »
Anglais: And he said, Well; I will make a league with thee: but one thing I require of thee, that is, Thou shalt not see my face, except thou first bring Michal Saul's daughter, when thou comest to see my face.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam hot dita: ŋaa'a, nan min li bonot hiɗi naŋu, may va ma nan min joboŋ ka kepe, la naŋ min co vok iranu, naŋ ma maran Mikal goota vi Sawul tuwa.
Bulu: David a nga yalane na: Mvoʼé! Ma ye bo élat a wo; Ve ma sili wo jôme jia na ô bo te yen asu dam veñgeveñge ve wo soo ma Mikal, ngone Saül, éyoñe wo zu be ma.
Guiziga: Davit a mbiɗaŋ di: «Kuy! I sa jumˀay ati ka. Sey i cufuɗ gwat purla avu ka: Ɓa kisa so a mbuŋ ɗu na, siy ti ngwas ɗu Mikal na ndol le, Mikal, zuŋ ngi Sawul na. Da ki ga le kanah na, naɓa kisa so a mbuŋ ɗu far.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daawuda jaabi: “Booɗɗum, mi haɓɓan alkawal bee maaɗa. Ammaa woodi huunde woore nde ɗaɓɓanmi haa maaɗa: Sey a waddanammi Mikal ɓii Sawulu debbo hiddeko a wara, a yi'ammi.”
Fulfulde_DC: Daawuda jaabi: “Booɗɗum, mi haɓɓan alkawal bee maaɗa. Ammaa woodi huunde woore nde ɗaɓɓanmi haa maaɗa: Sey a waddanammi Mikal ɓii Sawulu debbo hiddeko a wara, a yi'ammi.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David kifa nú: «Ɔ dee, mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ mi ak nɛ mɔ kpɔk er mɛ. Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ tɛ mɛ zɔk am, kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ baa Mikal, boko-bem ko Saul tɛ nɛnɛ na, ká mɛ́ tɛ na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David kifa nú: «Ɔ dee, mi tɛ nɔ tɔk in mɛɛ, ɓɛɛ mi ak nɛ mɔ kpɔk er mɛ. Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ mɛ tɛ tɛ mɛ zɔk am, kà mɛ̀ nɛ́ baa Mikal, boko-bem ko Saul tɛ nɛnɛ na, ká mɛ́ tɛ na.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke David shɛ: «Tsagha ɗe 'ya kamene jikə geva na le 'ya. Ka'yɛwe kwete 'ya hwa wəsə ya kwetɛŋe va gha we: Mba na kese kasləyi ɗa keɗema na kekeleke ɗa male ta ɗa Mikal wəzha ta Sawəl. Ma tsagha nda nza na kashɛ se kadzawa kema ta ɗa.»
Tupurri: Dafid kal ferge gano: De ele, ndi tay ge jag yañ mbi de äo. AÀ ne, ndi wii mopo yañ do äo boñ, diñ ga ndo ko nen äi mono say ndo a de Mikal may mani Sawul do äo de maga ndo a see äi mono.

Francais: Et David envoya des messagers à Isboseth, fils de Saül, pour lui dire: « Donne-moi ma femme Michol, que j'ai épousée pour cent prépuces de Philistins. »
Anglais: And David sent messengers to Ish–bosheth Saul's son, saying, Deliver me my wife Michal, which I espoused to me for an hundred foreskins of the Philistines.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: David cuk sumun tam Is-Boset goora vi Sawul, kay dum ala: Naŋ ma vulan cata van Mikal, ta nan ɗuma' hiɗi vun yuw sum sa Filistin kista.
Bulu: A David a nga lôm Isbôsét e mona Saül, minlôman be jô nye na: Keʼe ma minga wom Mikal, nyô bia nye bi nga tiñeti aluk nsuba ô too, bikôbe metyele Befilisteñ ntet.
Guiziga: Davit a slin ng'avu Isebaˀal, mangal ngi Sawulo, ɓa ara ɓakaŋ: «Vuliy Mikal, ngwas ɗu, ya muzuɓa na, yi vul ar deɗe ngi zlile, i mbuŋ ngi Filistihey skat.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daawuda neli boo nelaaɓe haa Isboset, o wi'i mo: “Hokkitam debbo am Mikal. Mi ɓaŋri mo bee lare saadooniiku Filisti'en teemerre .”
Fulfulde_DC: Daawuda neli boo nelaaɓe haa Isboset, o wi'i mo: “Hokkitam debbo am Mikal. Mi ɓaŋri mo bee lare saadooniiku Filisti'en teemerre .”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David toma o betom ha̧ Isbosɛt, bem ko Saul hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ tóm kóò kɔ‘m Mikal n'am ha̧a̧ mbɔi-a nɛ mbii ko o be Filistii gɔmŋmaa piinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧‘m.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David toma o betom ha̧ Isbosɛt, bem ko Saul hee mɔ'ɔ ga: «Mɛ̀ tóm kóò kɔ‘m Mikal n'am ha̧a̧ mbɔi-a nɛ mbii ko o be Filistii gɔmŋmaa piinɛ ɗoŋ ha̧‘m.»
Kapsiki_DC: Pa David ghwenakɛ mɛ kageze nda ke Ishebal, wəzege ta Sawəl: «Ndeke ɗa male ta ɗa Mikal nya wəmekɛ 'ya le mɓɛta ta ka Filisti gwəmsə.»
Tupurri: Day Dafid raw laa jar wo see Is-Bosed je ni Sawuln ma riñgi äe gano: Haç waçy äi Mikal maga ndi dan de jag äï¡ï¡ni jar Filisteçeç wo kis le me.

Francais: Isboseth l'envoya prendre à son mari Phaltiel, fils de Laïs;
Anglais: And Ish–bosheth sent, and took her from her husband, even from Phaltiel the son of Laish.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Is-Boset kal va'ay hay ziyna vi jufa' Paltiyel goora vi Layis.
Bulu: Ane Isbôsét a nga ke nyoñe nye be nnôme wé Paltiél, e mona Layis;
Guiziga: Isebaˀal a slin, ara zuɓoko Mikal a hay mangasl naŋ Paltiyel, mangal ngi Layise.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Isboset neli hoocugo mo haa goriiko Paltiyel ɓii Layis.
Fulfulde_DC: Isboset neli hoocugo mo haa goriiko Paltiyel ɓii Layis.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Isbosɛt toma nɛ́ɛ̀ ba kóò‘i tɛ ko wíì kɔ̧-a̧ Paltiɛl bem ko Lais.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Isbosɛt toma nɛ́ɛ̀ ba kóò‘i tɛ ko wíì kɔ̧-a̧ Paltiɛl bem ko Lais.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ishebal keseke Mikal ki ghɛa za nta Paltiyɛl ɓiyitsa, wəzege ta Layish.
Tupurri: Is-Bosed kal laa jar baage äe le go ni war äe Paltiyel je ni Lakis no.

Francais: et son mari l'accompagna, marchant et pleurant derrière elle, jusqu'à Bathurim. Là Abner lui dit: « Va, retourne chez toi. » Et il s'en retourna.
Anglais: And her husband went with her along weeping behind her to Bahurim. Then said Abner unto him, Go, return. And he returned.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jufa' tap kuɗa' hiɗi tiyna ta-ta hay Basurim, bugol kayni Abner di talamu. Tuɗaŋu, hotaŋu! Nala nam hotiya.
Bulu: Nnôme wé a nga zu a tôñe nye a yônôk a kui Bahurim. Eyoñe te a nga jô nye na: Kele wé a bulane mvus! Eyoñe te a nga bulan.
Guiziga: Mikala, mangasl naŋ a kisa sesẽŋ a Bahurim, ti tuwuy aseˀeŋ. Abner a ɓaŋ a diga ɓa a mi ngi hay, a cinaŋ mi, a mi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Goriiko tokki mo bee bojji haa ɓe njotti Bahuriima. Nden Abineer wi'i mo: “Dillu jonta, hootu!” Nden o hooti.
Fulfulde_DC: Goriiko tokki mo bee bojji haa ɓe njotti Bahuriima. Nden Abineer wi'i mo: “Dillu jonta, hootu!” Nden o hooti.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wíì kɔ̧-a̧ nɛɛ in a̧. A̧ nɛa ɗoŋ-aa hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ hɔ Bahurim. Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ yák, mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ si ɗoŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wíì kɔ̧-a̧ nɛɛ in a̧. A̧ nɛa ɗoŋ-aa hi̧i̧ nɛ̀ kɔ̧a̧ hɔ Bahurim. Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Mɛ̀ yák, mɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ.» Ɓɛɛ a̧ si ɗoŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Paltiyɛl kabeghe. Kadzeghwa ŋkɛ kwa sebe ta nta le nehwene hwa'a mbe Bahəwrim, tsagha ne, pa Abnɛr gezete nda kazhɛne geva ŋkɛ kalə sha ghɛa ŋkɛ, pa yɛte.
Tupurri: War äen raw mañ blam äe le de ro haçaç a go Bahurim. AÀ bner kal riñgi äe ga: See, day ndo fer jag äo. Se kal ferge liñ.

Francais: Abner eut des pourparlers avec les anciens d'Israël, et leur dit: « Vous désiriez depuis longtemps déjà avoir David pour roi;
Anglais: And Abner had communication with the elders of Israel, saying, Ye sought for David in times past to be king over you:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abner tok sum sa maariyana vi Israyel, nam di tisiya: Jew ɓa-ɓa kaw nigi ka gar kay David ma li mi mulla vigiya ɗisu?
Bulu: Ane Abnér ba be bemvendé yʼIsraél be nga laan a a nga jô be na: Mi juʼuya Kômbô bi David a bo njô bôte wônan;
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Abner a zlaka kiɗa slir ati micawwa ngi Israyeleye. A ɓa taŋ: «Zle zle vuna sina, ki ra wuɗam Davite ngi buy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abineer dawri bee ndotti'en Isra'iila. O wi'i ɓe: “Naa diga ɓooyma on ɗon ɗaɓɓa haa Daawuda wona laamiiɗo mon na?
Fulfulde_DC: Abineer dawri bee ndotti'en Isra'iila. O wi'i ɓe: “Naa diga ɓooyma on ɗon ɗaɓɓa haa Daawuda wona laamiiɗo mon na?
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Abnɛr ee zu-wen in o gasawi  Israɛl . A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Zɛ dɔka kaɗi n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ David mɛ ɔ wan zu'nɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Abnɛr ee zu-wen in o gasawi  Israɛl . A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Zɛ dɔka kaɗi n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧ɔ̧ so ha̧ David mɛ ɔ wan zu'nɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Abnɛr gezehwe ghena le mbelia jama ta ka Israyɛl, ma ke hɛ shɛ: «Ɓəshi ɓeshi yɛ kaɗe David kanza kamazea ŋayɛ we.
Tupurri: Abner raw ndalge de jar kluuri ma Israyeln wo day wii ra gano: Nday hay dage tum ga Dafid mo hay diñ wañ äay.

Francais: agissez donc maintenant, car Yahweh a dit à David: C'est par la main de David, mon serviteur, que je délivrerai mon peuple d'Israël de la main des Philistins et de la main de tous ses ennemis. »
Anglais: Now then do it: for the  Lord  hath spoken of David, saying, By the hand of my servant David I will save my people Israel out of the hand of the Philistines, and out of the hand of all their enemies.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulin kayn tungit mul yo, kay Ma-Vatɗin di kalam ala: Nan ma but sumuna van sa Israyella goy hay ɓam sa Filistina hiɗi sa gaw kisin kaf ɗawni hiɗi ɓam David.
Bulu: Boʼone jame te éyoñe ji, amu Nti a jôya ajô dé na; nyiane ya ayoñe dam Israél e wo Befilisteñ, a wo besiñe bé bese wo ye so be David mbo ésaé wom.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine, hana i hin ngi gi naŋ muduba so. Asi mike na, Buymisemuŋ a ɓi ani vur Davite: ‹Israyel, mizli ɗuwoyo, i sa laha taŋ ti haŋ Filistiheye gar, yo ti haŋ mesene taŋhay gar na, mbele gawla ɗu Daviti.›»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kadi jonta woni saa'iire fottunde. Ciftore ko Jawmiraawo wi'no: Bee juŋngo jaggiiɗo am Daawuda kisnanmi yimɓe am Isra'iila'en juuɗe Filisti'en e konne'en muuɗum'en woɗɓe fuu.”
Fulfulde_DC: Kadi jonta woni saa'iire fottunde. Ciftore ko Jawmiraawo wi'no: Bee juŋngo jaggiiɗo am Daawuda kisnanmi yimɓe am Isra'iila'en juuɗe Filisti'en e konne'en muuɗum'en woɗɓe fuu.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ kinii ŋgaɓo! Zɔ́k, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu David'e, wi tɛ gbo dukbíí kɔ‘i, o be  Israɛl  er o be Filistii in o wisɛn kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ David, wi-de-tom kɔ‘i.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ kinii ŋgaɓo! Zɔ́k, GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen zu David'e, wi tɛ gbo dukbíí kɔ‘i, o be  Israɛl  er o be Filistii in o wisɛn kɔ-wa lɛŋ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ David, wi-de-tom kɔ‘i.»
Kapsiki_DC: Yawa, və kemene ta ŋayɛ nya tsetsenya! Kwa nza nde nahe Mahwətə kegezete ghena te David: ‹Laka nde mene slene ta ɗa David tembele ka Israyɛl 'ya, mbelia ɗa nyi sleke ka Filisti ba'a va kweci ka ghema ta nci pɛtɛ.›»
Tupurri: Patala wur äe a we so werga Manwur hay waçaç we go ti äe gano: Ndi yaçaç ge Israyel jar mani äin wo go do jar Filisteçeç wo de jar hee äaaran wo mo äuy na nen do Dafidi, weejoçoç äi no.

Francais: Abner parla aussi aux oreilles de Benjamin, et Abner alla reporter aux oreilles de David, à Hébron, ce qui paraissait bon aux yeux d'Israël et aux yeux de toute la maison de Benjamin.
Anglais: And Abner also spake in the ears of Benjamin: and Abner went also to speak in the ears of David in Hebron all that seemed good to Israel, and that seemed good to the whole house of Benjamin.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abner di sle namna tam sa fi Benyamin kaw, nam kali tam David hay Hebron kay dum sle ma sum sa Israyel dum kafna, hiɗi jafna vi Benyamin kaf kaw.
Bulu: Abnér a nga kobô fe Bebenyaminite, a nga ke kate mam mete mese melo me David Ebroñ, mam mese Israél a nga yene mvaé mise mé a mise me nda Bényamin ése.
Guiziga: Abner a ɓam ati mizli Benjameŋheye ma. A dirba nah na, Abnere, ɓi naŋ muluma tivi mizli Benjameŋhey, yo waɗ tivi Israyeley gar na, ara ɓa da Davit a Hebroŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abineer wolidi bee yimɓe Benyamin boo. Nden o yehi haa Heburuun ngam haa o anndina Daawuda ko Isra'iila'en e yimɓe Benyamin narri waɗugo.
Fulfulde_DC: Abineer wolidi bee yimɓe Benyamin boo. Nden o yehi haa Heburuun ngam haa o anndina Daawuda ko Isra'iila'en e yimɓe Benyamin narri waɗugo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ o be Bɛnjamin, ɓɛɛ yak si Hebrɔŋ tɛ David mɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ o be  Israɛl  in nutua ko Bɛnjamin tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen'i ha̧ o be Bɛnjamin, ɓɛɛ yak si Hebrɔŋ tɛ David mɛ we ɗoŋ mɔ lɛŋ nɛ o be  Israɛl  in nutua ko Bɛnjamin tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Abnɛr gezehwe ghena le ka Bɛnjamɛn perə. Cape kadzembe Hɛbron le ghəa ŋkɛ kezha ncɛ nda ghena nya yɛhwe mbelia Bɛnjamɛn ba'a kweci ka Israyɛl.
Tupurri: Abner kal ndalge de jar Benjame wo lay. Se raw age Hebroñ fer feçeçre maga sen wo de el nen jar Israyel wo de tiñ mani Benjamen mo äuy ne Dafidi

Francais: Abner vint près de David, à Hébron, accompagné de vingt hommes; et David fit un festin à Abner et aux hommes qui l'accompagnaient.
Anglais: So Abner came to David to Hebron, and twenty men with him. And David made Abner and the men that were with him a feast.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam co kat David hay Hebron, sumun tapay kuɗum dok-ma', David li yuldeta kay Abner hiɗi sum sa kuɗumna kafe.
Bulu: Abnér a nga kui be David Ebroñ ba be bôte mewôm mebaé, a David a nga bo Abnér beta dina a bôt ba be nye be nga so.
Guiziga: Abnere, waɗ mizli aseˀe kukur cuw, a soko a lumaka Davit a Hebroŋ. Davit a ga gwat ngi zum da Abner ati mizli ngi seˀeheye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Abineer wari haa Heburuun, kaŋko e worɓe noogas, Daawuda waɗani ɓe nyaamduuji.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Abineer wari haa Heburuun, kaŋko e worɓe noogas, Daawuda waɗani ɓe nyaamduuji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abnɛr in o bíí ɓu-yiitoo nɛɛ tɛ David sɛn Hebrɔŋ mɛ; ɓɛɛ David de gasa nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ in o bíí nɛ nɛɛ in a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abnɛr in o bíí ɓu-yiitoo nɛɛ tɛ David sɛn Hebrɔŋ mɛ; ɓɛɛ David de gasa nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ a̧ in o bíí nɛ nɛɛ in a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa'a ŋkɛ sha David kwa Hɛbron, hɛ le mbeli bakemsə. Pa David sha wəshi kezeme kwele kwele va hɛ.
Tupurri: Abner raw age Hebroñ see Dafid de jar wer äe hwal hwal äoge. Dafid kal joñ few ma kluu wer Abner wo de jar maga hay wo wer äe mono.

Francais: Et Abner dit à David: « Je vais me lever et partir pour rassembler tout Israël vers mon seigneur le roi; ils feront alliance avec toi et tu régneras sur tout ce que ton âme désire. » Et David congédia Abner, qui s'en alla en paix.
Anglais: And Abner said unto David, I will arise and go, and will gather all Israel unto my lord the king, that they may make a league with thee, and that thou mayest reign over all that thine heart desireth. And David sent Abner away; and he went in peace.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Abner di tam David: Nan min fok kulo'o, nan min tok sa Israyella kaf kat Mulla vanu; nisi ma jun bonot hiɗi naŋu, naŋ ma ti mul kisi kafe ki naŋ min nala. David tun ir Abner, nam kali hay sle'ta.
Bulu: Abnér a nga jô David na: Me tame zu ke sulan Israél ase éjôé masa wom a ne njô bôte si; ba ye bo élat a wo, éyoñe te njôane wôé wo ye bo ngumba avale wo yene mvaé. Ane David a nga suu Abnér a ke, nde a nga ke mvoʼé .
Guiziga: Abner a ɓa Davite: «Kumani ɗu, wurenna i juw vu le ngi kuso Israyeleye gar ng'avu ka, buy. A sa jumomˀay ati ka, yo kisa zum buy ar li gar ka muwuɗ le.» Davit a mbiɗa mi da Abnere, joˀ naŋ aru ti zuy gwaɗ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Abineer wi'i mo: “Mi yahan jonta, mi mooɓta Isra'iila'en fuu, mi yahra ɓe haa maaɗa, barkaama. Sey ɓe kaɓɓa alkawal bee maaɗa, ngam haa a laato laamiiɗo mo a yiɗi laamanaago fuu.” Daawuda jaɓɓiti Abineer, kaŋko o dilli jam.
Fulfulde_DC: Abineer wi'i mo: “Mi yahan jonta, mi mooɓta Isra'iila'en fuu, mi yahra ɓe haa maaɗa, barkaama. Sey ɓe kaɓɓa alkawal bee maaɗa, ngam haa a laato laamiiɗo mo a yiɗi laamanaago fuu.” Daawuda jaɓɓiti Abineer, kaŋko o dilli jam.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ David: «Mi tɛ mɔi̧ o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ a ɗoŋ‘nɛ́, nyaa wannu. Wa tɛ nɔ tɔk in'nɛ̀ɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ wan fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧.» Ɓɛɛ David e Abnɛr yak zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Abnɛr tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ David: «Mi tɛ mɔi̧ o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ a ɗoŋ‘nɛ́, nyaa wannu. Wa tɛ nɔ tɔk in'nɛ̀ɛ́, ɓɛɛ ɛnɛ tɛ ɔ wan fara lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ kɔ̧a̧.» Ɓɛɛ David e Abnɛr yak zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Abnɛr sha David: «Mazea ɗa, 'ya kaslə katetsene pɛtɛa ka Israyɛl yitea gha. Tsagha ne, pa hɛ kamene jikə geva le gha, wərə na kamene meghe te hɛɗi pɛtɛ kala nya zəzə na.» Pa David ndeke nda hweŋkwa ke Abnɛr kalə, pa slə le kwelɛŋe.
Tupurri: Abner day wii Dafid gano: Ndi da urgi go ciñ ma woge tay Israyel wo le go äuy wer wañ je waçaçre äi no. AÀ tay ge wo jag yañ go de äo, day ndo joñ ge yañ go diñ wañ äaara boñ äuy tu do maga ndo da nono. Dafid kal mbe men Abner mbe rawge so, se kal rawge jam.

Francais: Mais voici que les serviteurs de David et Joab revenaient d'une excursion, ramenant avec eux un grand butin. Abner n'était plus auprès de David à Hébron, car David l'avait congédié et il s'en était allé en paix.
Anglais: And, behold, the servants of David and Joab came from pursuing a troop, and brought in a great spoil with them: but Abner was not with David in Hebron; for he had sent him away, and he was gone in peace.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Duw na kayni, Yowab hiɗi sumuna vi David may goy ti ɓuraŋ pa, nisi mar sle ma ɓuraŋ kisi ŋolo. Abner may kat David hay Hebron loɗi, kay David gum iram gi, nam kali malam hiɗi sle'ta.
Bulu: Nde a zu bo na bebo bisaé be David be soʼo kpwatôla be bili abui akum, Abnér a nji fe beta bo be David Ebroñ, amu David a nga suu nye a ke, a a nga ke mvoʼé .
Guiziga: Neˀ na, gawla ngi Davitey ati Zoˀap a moko tir li gi vurumo, a lumoko, zlili le haɗa a haŋ. Naɓa Abnere, naŋ anta a ciki Davit a Hebroŋ mata, asi Davit a pulaŋ a cuh le ti zuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-biro ko David in Jɔab pii so kɔ‘i pii nɛ̀ yí biro, kai nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ̀ dɔka-a piinɛ. Abnɛr bo so kɔ‘i in David sɛn Hebrɔŋ ɓɔna, wen nɛ̀ David ee so a̧ yak zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-biro ko David in Jɔab pii so kɔ‘i pii nɛ̀ yí biro, kai nɛ̀ o mɔɔ-oi-biro nɛ̀ dɔka-a piinɛ. Abnɛr bo so kɔ‘i in David sɛn Hebrɔŋ ɓɔna, wen nɛ̀ David ee so a̧ yak zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Temə ɓɛhwɛ ne, pɛkwe yɛ Zhowab le mbeli nyi keya David. Sheke kwamte mpa le wəshi kwele kwele nyi fəke hɛ hwa mpa. Mba Abnɛr kwa ghɛa David kwa Hɛbron we, kwa nza ŋkɛ na maze kesərəakɛ kaslə le kwelɛŋe.
Tupurri: Kola weere joçoçre Dafid wo de Jowab fer wo le jag jaw wo de feçeçre maga saara yaçaç ra le jag jaw do debañ. AÀ bner hay bay Hebroñ see Dafid ni wa so werga Dafid hay menn rawge day se hay raw jam.

Francais: Joab et toute la troupe qui était avec lui arrivèrent, et on fit ce rapport à Joab: « Abner, fils de Ner, est venu auprès du roi, qui l'a congédié, et il s'en est allé en paix. »
Anglais: When Joab and all the host that was with him were come, they told Joab, saying, Abner the son of Ner came to the king, and he hath sent him away, and he is gone in peace.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni Yowab hiɗi vok ma kuɗumna kaf cooya, nisi ka vul labara mi Yowab ala: Abner goora vi Ner co tani kat mulla, mulla tunum hay hagata, nam kali malam hiɗi sle'ta.
Bulu: Eyoñe Yôab a nkane bita ôse ba be wô be mbe be nga suan, be nga kate Yôab foé na: Abnér, e mona Ner, a too be njô bôt, ve njô bôt a suuya nye na a ke, a a keya mvoʼé .
Guiziga: Zoˀap ati soje naŋhaya gar mindiloko na, a soko, a ɓaka Zoˀapa, «Abner, mangal ngi Ner, a so le a hay buy aka, buy a pula le, a cuh le ti zuy.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ Jɔab in o wi-biro kɔ‘i hɔa, wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr tɛɛ hɔ oi'nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧ zɔk nɛ wannu David, ɓɛɛ wannu David e war ha̧ a̧ yak zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ Jɔab in o wi-biro kɔ‘i hɔa, wa tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ a̧: «Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr tɛɛ hɔ oi'nɛ́ hɛ̧ɛ̧ zɔk nɛ wannu David, ɓɛɛ wannu David e war ha̧ a̧ yak zaŋ ga̧a̧mɔ.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sheke Zhowab kwamte mpa le ka sewajɛ nyi nza ŋkɛ le hɛ, ma ke mbeli gezete nda ghena: «Teke se Abnɛr, wəzege ta Nɛr, sha meghe, pa sərəakɛ ŋkɛ kaslə le kwelɛŋe.»
Tupurri: De maga Jowab wo de jar durgi maga hay wo wer äe aà wo mono, aè raw sii waçaçre ne Jowab gano: Abner je ni Nern hay a see wañ se men rawge day se raw mbe jam.

Francais: Joab se rendit chez le roi et dit: « Qu'as-tu fait? Voilà qu'Abner est venu vers toi: pourquoi l'as-tu congédié et laissé partir?
Anglais: Then Joab came to the king, and said, What hast thou done? behold, Abner came unto thee; why is it that thou hast sent him away, and he is quite gone?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yowab kali kat mulla, nam di'e: Mulla, naŋ lum na kayni mi mige? Wulin kayn Abner co kataŋu; may naŋ gum iramu, hinim kala kay mige?
Bulu: Nde Yôab a nga ke be njô bôt a jô na: Jé wo te bo? Ma wôʼô na Abnér a be be wo; amu jé wo te jôʼé nye na a ke teke bo nye jôm?
Guiziga: Zoˀap a so luuma buyo, a ɓaŋ: «Ki gi gwat mi hanaka? Pura, Abner a so le a hay ɗike! Ki pula a cuh kanah vur mike?
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum Yo'ab yehi haa laamiiɗo, wi'i mo: “Ɗume mbaɗɗaa? Abineer wari haa maaɗa! Ngam ɗume accuɗa mo o dilli?
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum Yo'ab yehi haa laamiiɗo, wi'i mo: “Ɗume mbaɗɗaa? Abineer wari haa maaɗa! Ngam ɗume accuɗa mo o dilli?
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔab nɛɛ kpa wannu, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Nɛ́ ge ɛnɛ dea’ɛ ge? Abnɛr tɛɛ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ wen ge ɛnɛ ee a̧ yak hegɔ ge?
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔab nɛɛ kpa wannu, ɓɛɛ tɔ̧: «Nɛ́ ge ɛnɛ dea’ɛ ge? Abnɛr tɛɛ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɓɛɛ wen ge ɛnɛ ee a̧ yak hegɔ ge?
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa'a Zhowab sha meghe, ma ke shɛ: «Wa nya wəsə menete na wa? Nahe Abnɛr kese sha gha, wa raberə pelakɛ ŋkɛ na kaslə kala nya wa?
Tupurri: Jowab raw woge ni wañ day gano: Ndo joñ sen na mayla? Koëa, Abner a see äo, ndo menn rawge day se raw mbe wo caw lay mo na megela?

Francais: Tu connais Abner, fils de Ner: c'est pour te tromper qu'il est venu, pour épier ta conduite, et savoir tout ce que tu fais. »
Anglais: Thou knowest Abner the son of Ner, that he came to deceive thee, and to know thy going out and thy coming in, and to know all that thou doest.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naŋ wi Abner goora vi Ner! Nam co kayni kay ɗutaŋu. Kay ɗuw gul liyn ma musta vaŋu, kay wi sle ma naŋ lum kafna.
Bulu: Wo yeme Abnér, e mona Nér! A te zu na a wone wo, asu ya yem mefeʼe mewosan ô bili, a yem e mam mese wo bo.
Guiziga: Abner, mangal ngi Ner na, ki si na le takwa: naŋ muso na, ɓa ngi guw gilaw, ɓa a si na gwat ka mawuɗ ngi gi ngi gi ar vurum waɗ slra ɗikey gar ta kwa?»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Naa a anndi Abineer? O wari ƴoyrugo ma tan, ngam haa o heɓta taaskara ma e ko waɗata fuu.”
Fulfulde_DC: Naa a anndi Abineer? O wari ƴoyrugo ma tan, ngam haa o heɓta taaskara ma e ko waɗata fuu.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛnɛ iŋ Abnɛr, bem ko Nɛr na nde? A̧ tɛɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔr'nɛ́, ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpe naŋ nɛɛ-nɔ̀ in pia-ɗoŋ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ha̧ a̧ mɛ iŋ mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ de!»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛnɛ iŋ Abnɛr, bem ko Nɛr na nde? A̧ tɛɛ ha̧ a̧ mɛ ɔr'nɛ́, ha̧ a̧ mɛ kpe naŋ nɛɛ-nɔ̀ in pia-ɗoŋ k’ɛ́nɛ́, ha̧ a̧ mɛ iŋ mɔ lɛŋ n’ɛnɛ de!»
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe na keɗepe Abnɛr megela, wəzege ta Nɛr! Kezha ghwete ŋa se ŋkɛ, kezha ɗepete hɛɗia ŋa ba'a le wəsə nya mene na.»
Tupurri: Ndo yañ mbo de ko Abner je ni Ner no! A nduu na jaçaç moge nen maga se mo da' wer go ne jar maga ndo da dur rage mono, ma da' wer go ne fen maga ndo de joñge äe mo äuy no.

Francais: Joab, ayant quitté David, envoya sur les traces d'Abner des messagers qui le ramenèrent depuis la citerne de Sira, sans que David en sût rien.
Anglais: And when Joab was come out from David, he sent messengers after Abner, which brought him again from the well of Sirah: but David knew it not.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Yowab hin David hinna, nam cuk sumun kuɗ Abner, sum nisin hotomay hay zul hiɗiyna vi Sira pa: David may hum noŋ ne'ɗi.
Bulu: Eyoñe Yôab a kôlôya be David, a nga lôme minlôman be Abnér nde be nga bulane nye mvus a koé na a Kuiya ébé mendime ya Sira; David a nji yeme jame te.
Guiziga: Zoˀap mibi ti hay buy na, a slin mizli ɓaˀa asi Abnere. Mizli ara moko di zle a mifutuŋ ngi Sira. Davit a si na ɓi nah ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Yo'ab wurti saare laamiiɗo, o neli nelaaɓe ɓaawo Abineer ngam haa ɓe ngartira mo. Daawuda anndaa koo ɗume. Nelaaɓe tawi Abineer haa ɓulndu Sira.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Yo'ab wurti saare laamiiɗo, o neli nelaaɓe ɓaawo Abineer ngam haa ɓe ngartira mo. Daawuda anndaa koo ɗume. Nelaaɓe tawi Abineer haa ɓulndu Sira.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔab gboo nɛ̀ tɛ́ David, ɓɛɛ tom o betom nɛnɛ ɗoŋ Abnɛr. Wa nɛ̀ɛ́ kpa a̧ ká̧ gɔna-yì Sira, ɓɛɛ wa sa a̧ piinɛ ɗoŋ; David iŋ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔab gboo nɛ̀ tɛ́ David, ɓɛɛ tom o betom nɛnɛ ɗoŋ Abnɛr. Wa nɛ̀ɛ́ kpa a̧ ká̧ gɔna-yì Sira, ɓɛɛ wa sa a̧ piinɛ ɗoŋ; David iŋ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa shave Zhowab ki ghɛa maze ne, le ghena kekese Abnɛr mbe ghə, keɗepe David we, pa keleke kwa wəsə kala weta ta ka Sira.
Tupurri: De maga Jowab men Dafid go mono, se raw laa jar wo wer Abnere. Saara wo le ferge äe le jag gutug ma Siran haçaç, Dafid hay bay de ko ree sen wa hase.

Francais: Quand Abner fut de retour à Hébron, Joab le tira à l'écart, dans l'intérieur de la porte, comme pour lui parler tranquillement, et là il le frappa au ventre; il mourut, à cause du sang d'Asaël, frère de Joab.
Anglais: And when Abner was returned to Hebron, Joab took him aside in the gate to speak with him quietly, and smote him there under the fifth rib, that he died, for the blood of Asahel his brother.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma Abner hoti hay Hebron, Yowab yum goy ŋayaya hay vun-ziyna, ki nam min dum va goy ŋayaya nala, nam jikim hayam kip', cap cum goy mati, kay job yam ɓasulumna Asayel.
Bulu: Eyoñe Abnér a nga bulan Ebroñ, Yôab a nga dutu nye fefe ézezañe mbé , ane môt a kômbô kobô nye ômômoʼo, a valé nye a nga bibi nye abum mbiban awu. Ajô te Abnér a nga wu amu metyi mʼAsaél, monyañe Yôab.
Guiziga: Abnere, ti naŋ mindilo a Hebroŋ na, Zoˀap a ɗiɗa baˀ ng'avi mizlingre ngi walahaya, kaɓa a wuɗ ɓa a ɓaŋ ɓi ti miyaŋ yaŋ. Adiga, a zliga daˀ ar cakay a muc, ɓa ngi pula cuwal ngi sukum naŋ Asayel.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O lorti bee maɓɓe haa Heburuun. Yo'ab yahri mo feere maako haa nastirde berniwol, bana o yiɗi wolwango mo bee sirri. Ton o yuwi mo haa reedu, o maayi. Bana nii Yo'ab mbardiri mo ngam waataago deerɗum Asa'el mbaraaɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: O lorti bee maɓɓe haa Heburuun. Yo'ab yahri mo feere maako haa nastirde berniwol, bana o yiɗi wolwango mo bee sirri. Ton o yuwi mo haa reedu, o maayi. Bana nii Yo'ab mbardiri mo ngam waataago deerɗum Asa'el mbaraaɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ Abnɛr pia ɗoŋ hɔ Hebrɔŋ, Jɔab mgbɔɔ a̧ yaknɛ si ká̧ nú garo hee a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ nɛ ŋma ga̧a̧ wen ha̧ a̧ ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ tok a̧ tɛ zaŋ, kifi nɛ̀ er tɔk-tɛ nya-a̧ Asahɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ Abnɛr pia ɗoŋ hɔ Hebrɔŋ, Jɔab mgbɔɔ a̧ yaknɛ si ká̧ nú garo hee a̧ tɛ tɔ̧ nɛ ŋma ga̧a̧ wen ha̧ a̧ ga, ɓɛɛ a̧ tok a̧ tɛ zaŋ, kifi nɛ̀ er tɔk-tɛ nya-a̧ Asahɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa zhɛneghe geva Abnɛr kadzawa Hɛbron, pa Zhowab hekate kashave kwa mɛa degha ta meleme, kala wəndə nya keɗe kageze nda ghena nya tewəfərə. Tɛapa'a ŋkɛ sha hwa te hwə ve kawa mte ta wəza meghekɛ Asayɛl.
Tupurri: De maga Abner fer le Hebroñ mono, Jowab raw baage äe go ti jeñ jag tiñ doga se fer waçaçre po ne hen go freñ nono. Ti ngeel ni se raw tuñgi äe äili. AÀ bner hu go ti hee Asayel hen Jowab no.

Francais: David l'apprit ensuite, et il dit: « Je suis à jamais, moi et mon royaume, innocent, devant Yahweh, du sang d'Abner, fils de Ner.
Anglais: And afterward when David heard it, he said, I and my kingdom are guiltless before the  Lord  for ever from the blood of Abner the son of Ner:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolda David hum labar namna, nala nam di'e: Vok Ma-Vatɗina, Abner goora vi Ner busuwam may kanɗi, mulda van kaw hayɗi lay.
Bulu: Mvus éte nje David a nga nyoñe foé éte a jô na: Me ne mfuban e mise me Nti ajô metyi me Abnér, e mona Nér, avale te fe éjôé jam.
Guiziga: Davit micina ɓi nah cin na, a ɓi ti gidaŋ: «Vur pumbus ngi Abner, mangal ngi Ner na, ya ati zumabuy ɗu, ndra cimak a mbuŋ Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Daawuda nani haala maajum, o wi'i: “Mi walaa aybe dow maayde Abineer, min bee yimɓe laamu am. Jawmiraawo woni ceedoowo yam. Ngam maajum kiita maako warataa dow amin haa foroy.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Daawuda nani haala maajum, o wi'i: “Mi walaa aybe dow maayde Abineer, min bee yimɓe laamu am. Jawmiraawo woni ceedoowo yam. Ngam maajum kiita maako warataa dow amin haa foroy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ David zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mi in mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m lɛŋ, ɛɛ bo k’ɛɛ ɗɔɔ fom ti GASA WAN wen tɔk-tɛ Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ David zia nyɛrɛ mɔ‘i, a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Mi in mɔɔ-wan kɔ‘m lɛŋ, ɛɛ bo k’ɛɛ ɗɔɔ fom ti GASA WAN wen tɔk-tɛ Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa fate wəsə nya kemenete geva David ne, kɛake sha lewela: «Nahe Mahwətə keɗepe kaɗema fete va 'ya le mbeli nyi te hɛɗia ɗa hwa mte ta Abnɛr, wəzege ta Nɛr.
Tupurri: Dafid kal laa waçaçre sen blam day gano: Pel Manwuri ndi go de yogge. Ci Abner je ni Nern bay ti äi wa lay, bay ti sir äin waa lay.

Francais: Que ce sang retombe sur la tête de Joab et sur toute la maison de son père! Qu'il y ait toujours dans la maison de Joab un homme qui souffre d'un flux ou de la lèpre, ou qui tienne le fuseau, ou qui tombe par l'épée, ou qui manque de pain. »
Anglais: Let it rest on the head of Joab, and on all his father's house; and let there not fail from the house of Joab one that hath an issue, or that is a leper, or that leaneth on a staff, or that falleth on the sword, or that lacketh bread.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Busuw namna ma nig kay Yowab hiɗi jafna vi bulum kafe nig ge, a hay jafna vi Yowab dok-dok kayni, sa mara ma li kep hiɗi busuwn jaŋ goy kuɗumu lebo, moy-kuturu talamu lebo, ma tubal hiɗi zugulu lebo, kew-gaferaŋ ma cum goyo lebo fi va ma tiɗige.
Bulu: Metyi mete me bebeʼe e nlô Yôab a nda bôte jé ése! Eyoñ ése, môte ya nda bôte Yôab a ye kone menyôlôk nge zam , nge nyô a wulu a ntum , nge wu a nkpwaté mekôn, nge tabe te jôme ya di!
Guiziga: Anja a mbiɗi nga hirnga Zoˀap ati mizli ngi hay naŋhay. A hay Zoˀapa, jiji ngi waˀa maɓul malla kukula, anja a tiki tikeˀ le avu mizli ngi hay naŋhaya ta, ziley a tiram migi slra ngi ngwasay, mizli mamicam muc migurjik malla may makiɗa taŋ ti kiɗi.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ka ukkano Yo'ab e banndiraaɓe mum. Foroy woɗɓe nder asŋgol maako nyawa nyawuji ilooji malla saɗawre, woɗɓe laato jiijiiɓe tuggiiɓe dow cabbi, woɗɓe maaya nder haɓre malla bee weelo.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ka ukkano Yo'ab e banndiraaɓe mum. Foroy woɗɓe nder asŋgol maako nyawa nyawuji ilooji malla saɗawre, woɗɓe laato jiijiiɓe tuggiiɓe dow cabbi, woɗɓe maaya nder haɓre malla bee weelo.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɔk-tɛ Abnɛr a̧ tík nɛ zu Jɔab in o bíí nutua kɔ‘i! Zɛɛ tɔk in doko a̧ bá o bíí nutua ko Jɔab. Wa a̧ ɓɔ́sí, kóó wa a̧ fé nɛ́ fio gba-paa, kóó san a̧ bá wa.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɔk-tɛ Abnɛr a̧ tík nɛ zu Jɔab in o bíí nutua kɔ‘i! Zɛɛ tɔk in doko a̧ bá o bíí nutua ko Jɔab. Wa a̧ ɓɔ́sí, kóó wa a̧ fé nɛ́ fio gba-paa, kóó san a̧ bá wa.»
Kapsiki_DC: Deke kənəa Zhowab ba'a mbelia ghɛa ŋkɛ dzeghə ghena ta ŋkɛ! Pa beze kanza ki ghɛa shɛ kaghala ghala, zhili ka wale wale, ka derena, mbeli nyi dewə wəshi va hɛ, zhili nyi kemene slene ta mi, zhili nyi mpə hɛ mbeli le kafayɛ, ka dewə wəsə kezeme!»
Tupurri: Daga ci äen mo fer mbe ne Jowab wo de jar ni äe ti. Daga ti wer mani Jowabn mono, jobo mo hay tum ni de colëo noga de ci, grum noga aè tawn go de moslam noga da' reege ma jag äe gaè.

Francais: C'est ainsi que Joab et Abisaï, son frère, tuèrent Abner, parce qu'il avait donné la mort à leur frère Asaël, à Gabaon, dans la bataille.
Anglais: So Joab and Abishai his brother slew Abner, because he had slain their brother Asahel at Gibeon in the battle.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala Yowab hiɗi ɓasulumna Abiskay ci Abner goyo, kay Abner ci ɓasusin Asayel hay Gabawon, vun duura.
Bulu: Avale di Yôab ba Abisayi monyañ be nga wôé Abnér, amu a nga wôé monyañe wop Asaél, e Gabaoñ, ézezañe mewosan.
Guiziga: Zoˀap ati sukum naŋ Abisay mikiɗaka Abner na, asi Abner mikiɗa sukum taŋ Asayele vagay ar kiɗa vu migi a Gabaˀoŋ na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bana nii Yo'ab e Abisay mbardiri Abineer, ngam kaŋko o mbarno Asa'el, deerɗiraawo maɓɓe, nder haɓre haa Gibiyon.
Fulfulde_DC: Bana nii Yo'ab e Abisay mbardiri Abineer, ngam kaŋko o mbarno Asa'el, deerɗiraawo maɓɓe, nder haɓre haa Gibiyon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jɔab in nya-a̧ Abisai gbɛɛ Abnɛr, wen n'aa gbɛɛ so nya kɔ-wa Asahɛl tɛ biro Gabaɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jɔab in nya-a̧ Abisai gbɛɛ Abnɛr, wen n'aa gbɛɛ so nya kɔ-wa Asahɛl tɛ biro Gabaɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsetse peslekɛ Abnɛr yɛ Zhowab le wəza meghekɛ Abishay va nya peslekɛ wəza megheyɛa nci Asayɛl ŋkɛ hwa mpa nya kwa Gabawon.
Tupurri: Diñ do kay no so no ga Jowab wo de hen äe Abisay ii wo Abner go werga aà hay 'war hen äaara Asayel le go Gabawoñ jag jaw mono.

Francais: David dit à Joab et à tout le peuple qui était avec lui: « Déchirez-vos vêtements, ceignez-vous de sacs et faites le deuil devant Abner. » Et le roi David marchait derrière la litière.
Anglais: And David said to Joab, and to all the people that were with him, Rend your clothes, and gird you with sackcloth, and mourn before Abner. And king David himself followed the bier.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: David di tam Yowab hiɗi sum sa ay kuɗumna kaf ala: Jetgi sligara vigi goyo, tungit haygi mi sligar-bolla, tiygi kay Abner. Mulla David ka tuɗ bugol tuwna may.
Bulu: Ane David a nga jô Yôab a bôte bese ba be nye be mbe na: Nyabane mengômesane menan, jaane minkuta a tabe meyeb été asu Abnér! Eyoñe te njô bôt a nga wulu ôlañ mvus.
Guiziga: Davit a ɓa Zoˀap ati mizli gar misi ati naŋ akẽh: «Ngiraka zana kumoyo, juwam zana ngi vagay, tuwaka vagay ngi Abnere daˀ a mbuŋ naŋ.» Joˀ buy Davite, naŋ aru ɓaˀ a dirba vagay ngi Abnere.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Daawuda umri Yo'ab e yimɓe wonduɓe bee muuɗum: “Ceeke limce mon, ɓorne limce buhuuje, ngam haa on mboya Abineer.” Nde ɓe ɗon njaha uwoygo mo, laamiiɗo Daawuda bee hoore muuɗum tokki naasiwo .
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Daawuda umri Yo'ab e yimɓe wonduɓe bee muuɗum: “Ceeke limce mon, ɓorne limce buhuuje, ngam haa on mboya Abineer.” Nde ɓe ɗon njaha uwoygo mo, laamiiɗo Daawuda bee hoore muuɗum tokki naasiwo .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ duk in a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ á̧k laa tɛ‘nɛ́ a nù; ɛ̀nɛ̀ á nɛ laa-bufu, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zím fio ko Abnɛr.» Wannu David duka ɗoŋ mɔɔ-gɔ-fio.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: David tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Jɔab in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ duk in a̧: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ á̧k laa tɛ‘nɛ́ a nù; ɛ̀nɛ̀ á nɛ laa-bufu, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ zím fio ko Abnɛr.» Wannu David duka ɗoŋ mɔɔ-gɔ-fio.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke David sha Zhowab le yɛ mbeli nyi nza hɛ pɛtɛ: «Ŋkweŋkwahemte mə lekwesa ta ŋayɛ, seɗete mə nyi wale wale nda se yɛ yitea nehwene ta Abnɛr kave zləvə te.» David meghe le ghəa ŋkɛ ne, kadzeghwa ŋkɛ kwa sebe ta wəndə kemte mte.
Tupurri: Dafid raw wii Jowab wo de jar maga hay wo see äe ni mo äuy gano: Ngrag wee oçoçbe ma ti äayn wo go, lag wee bugu wo ti äay day law wee ti ree Abnere! Dafid hay seege caw wer huli no.

Francais: On enterra Abner à Hébron. Le roi pleura à haute voix sur le tombeau d'Abner et tout le peuple pleura.
Anglais: And they buried Abner in Hebron: and the king lifted up his voice, and wept at the grave of Abner; and all the people wept.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi pi Abner hay Hebron. Mulla pat delem kulo'o, tiy kulo kay yam-usta vi Abner, sumun kaf mun tiyna.
Bulu: Be nga jame Abnér Ebroñ. Njô bôt a nga yôn; a bôte bese fe be nga yôn.
Guiziga: A dikaka Abner a Hebroŋ. Buy a hiziga tuwuy ar zivi ngi Abnere, dar mizli gar a tuwam aya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe uwi Abineer haa Heburuun. Daawuda woyi bee sawtu haa yenaande maako, yimɓe fuu mboyi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe uwi Abineer haa Heburuun. Daawuda woyi bee sawtu haa yenaande maako, yimɓe fuu mboyi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa guna Abnɛr sɛn Hebrɔŋ. Wannu taŋa kɔ̧a̧-fio Abnɛr zik nɛ pɛsi, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ a nú tɛ kɔ̧a̧ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa guna Abnɛr sɛn Hebrɔŋ. Wannu taŋa kɔ̧a̧-fio Abnɛr zik nɛ pɛsi, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ a nú tɛ kɔ̧a̧ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli lamte Abnɛr kwa Hɛbron. Ntake meghe kanehwene te kwele ta ŋkɛ, ca pɛtɛ mbeli kanehwene.
Tupurri: AÈ raw tee Abner go Hebroñ, wañ raw cagge go de ro, ngaäan äuy raw laa ro lay.

Francais: Le roi chanta un chant funèbre sur Abner, et dit: Abner devait-il mourir comme meurt un insensé?
Anglais: And the king lamented over Abner, and said, Died Abner as a fool dieth?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay tiyta valamu mulla ka di ala: Abner as mit ki sa ma jiw-zlat na ɗawn mittige?
Bulu: Ane njô bôt a nga yia jia ôlun asu Abnér a jô na: Ye Abnér a nga yiane wu ane môt a ne te fek?
Guiziga: Akẽh na, buy a zli dimis ngi tuwa Abnere. A ɓi ani: «Abner, ki muc di i muc ngi mbur gilaw vur mike?
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo yimi gimol boyki dow Abineer: “Kayto Abineer, ngam ɗume maayɗa bana faataaɓe maayrata?
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo yimi gimol boyki dow Abineer: “Kayto Abineer, ngam ɗume maayɗa bana faataaɓe maayrata?
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu dee gima-fio’ɛ zu Abnɛr: «Abnɛr tɛɛ fe so nɛ́ ŋga fio hegɔ nde?
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu dee gima-fio’ɛ zu Abnɛr: «Abnɛr tɛɛ fe so nɛ́ ŋga fio hegɔ nde?
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe, ma ke meghe ŋgaɗete ghə te ghəa Abnɛr: Abnɛr, wa raberə mte ŋa na, kala mte wəndə nya ɗema mehele ve wa?
Tupurri: Wañ kal 'waa siñ ma ra Abner gano: Abner hay mbe nen hu huli je loëge yawla?

Francais: Tes mains ne furent pas liées et tes pieds ne furent pas jetés dans les chaînes! Tu es tombé comme on tombe devant des scélérats. Tout le peuple continua de se lamenter sur Abner;
Anglais: Thy hands were not bound, nor thy feet put into fetters: as a man falleth before wicked men, so fellest thou. And all the people wept again over him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Baŋ may juniɗi lay, jaɓ may cuki seŋɗi lay, naŋ puki gaa'a ki san puk gaa vok sum sa joon nala.
Bulu: Mo môé me nji bo nkaʼan, nge mebo môé nkaʼan bengôkop! Avalʼane bôt ba ku ôsu, Ya! E bôt be ne ékotekot, Avale te ô kuya.
Guiziga: A juwukuw haŋhaya ti celelu ta, a cukuw sesele a sara ta. Ki diɗ le kaɓa mbur madiɗ a haŋ mufuyvuhoy.» Joˀ mizli gar a tuwam ava ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Juuɗe ma kaɓɓaaka, kosɗe ma naataay ge'elle. Ammaa a maayi bana mbaraaɗo mo waɗooɓe zunuuba mbari.” Nde yimɓe nani ɗum, ɓe ɓesdi woyugo.
Fulfulde_DC: Juuɗe ma kaɓɓaaka, kosɗe ma naataay ge'elle. Ammaa a maayi bana mbaraaɗo mo waɗooɓe zunuuba mbari.” Nde yimɓe nani ɗum, ɓe ɓesdi woyugo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bo nɛ wa hɛra so nɛ er-mɛ na, bo nɛ wi aa so nɛ nyak-boi naŋ-mɛ na! Mɛ tika nù fe hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i fe nɛnɛ ti o wi-gbɛ-zu’ɛ ga!» Ɓɛɛ dukbíí a nú tɛ kɔ̧a̧-fio siti.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bo nɛ wa hɛra so nɛ er-mɛ na, bo nɛ wi aa so nɛ nyak-boi naŋ-mɛ na! Mɛ tika nù fe hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ‘i fe nɛnɛ ti o wi-gbɛ-zu’ɛ ga!» Ɓɛɛ dukbíí a nú tɛ kɔ̧a̧-fio siti.
Kapsiki_DC: Kenza dzeve ta ŋa tehwepe we, zewe lɛ kwa seɗa we. Ya tsagha shɛ ŋkɛ tehwepərə na kemte mte kala nya teɗe wəndə te kema ta ka mpə ŋkwa. Pɛtɛa mbeli nyi tagha kanehwene.
Tupurri: Do äo hay bay wo go de bañge wa pa lay! Ko äaale äo hay bay wo ti geyam wa lay! Ndo le' mbo gesiñ tu, Doga aà le' pel jar ma bay ngarn wo nono!

Francais: et tout le peuple s'approcha de David pour lui faire prendre de la nourriture lorsqu'il était encore jour. Mais David fit ce serment: « Que Yahweh me traite dans toute sa rigueur, si je goûte du pain ou quoi que ce soit avant le coucher du soleil! »
Anglais: And when all the people came to cause David to eat meat while it was yet day, David sware, saying, So do God to me, and more also, if I taste bread, or ought else, till the sun be down.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala sumun kaf tiy mara lo kay Abner. Sumun kaf co tam David kay vulum va ma ti neɗe, hay li ma fatta ka tuwa; may David yi va kalamu, nam di'e: La nan tun fu vunanu lebo tum mi mige kaw jew ɗikŋa vi fatta ni, Lawn ma ka kitat kan hiɗi dikam kafe.
Bulu: Ane bôte bese be nga beta yôn Abnér. Ane bôte bese be nga zu be David na a di bidi éyoñe te môs ô ngenan; Ve David a nga kane ngana a jô na: Zambe a boʼo ma Jame dina a beté fe dili, nge ma ye tyeʼe adi nge jôm éfe ése te na jôp é dim!
Guiziga: Dar mizli a kirohoko ng'avu Davite, ɓa a vulakaŋ ɗaf a zum, amma Davit a ngum zuma ɗafa ta, naɓa i papasa aruŋ. Amma Davit a hudum a ɓi: «Pas midiɗ t'aruŋ, ɓa i titil ɗaf malla ko gwat wanaka gar na, anja Bumbulvuŋ a kutiy ti bonoy mukuyta wãˀ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawoɗon ɓe tori Daawuda o nyaama seɗɗa hiddeko jemma waɗa, ammaa o sali. O huni: “Allah hiito yam naawɗum, to mi mettake nyaamdu koo nduye hiddeko naaŋge muta.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawoɗon ɓe tori Daawuda o nyaama seɗɗa hiddeko jemma waɗa, ammaa o sali. O huni: “Allah hiito yam naawɗum, to mi mettake nyaamdu koo nduye hiddeko naaŋge muta.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dukbíí ɗafa mɔ ha̧ David mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ, ká zɛ tɛ de na, ɓɛɛ David kan mɔ; a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Sɔ̧ a̧ dé ŋgamɔ in am, a̧ a̧ dé mbe-a woyo kà‘m nɛ́ foo nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ nú‘m sɔsɔɔ nɛti ha̧ yee-wese!»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dukbíí ɗafa mɔ ha̧ David mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ, ká zɛ tɛ de na, ɓɛɛ David kan mɔ; a̧ tɔ̧a̧: «Sɔ̧ a̧ dé ŋgamɔ in am, a̧ a̧ dé mbe-a woyo kà‘m nɛ́ foo nyɔŋmɔ nɛ̀ nú‘m sɔsɔɔ nɛti ha̧ yee-wese!»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, pa mbeli hendeke nda geva ke David kave nda wəsə kezeme kwa nza ŋkwa mba heveci. Ma ke zemete fela: «Pa Shala ɗate ɗa kwele kwele kendɛamakɛ ɗafa 'ya, ya yayata wəsə ŋkɛ nda tepəkwə veci!»
Tupurri: Mo so no ngaäan äuy fer laa ro tigriñ ti Abner pa. Jarn äuy raw wo nduugi haç reege ne Dafid de maga wur hay ciñ ka' ëa mono, ama Dafid kal haç'ge go gano: Daga Baa mo joñ me de mopo doga äil da nono hayga ndi baa jag we ti reege noga mopo haçy tañgu le'ge wur gesiñ mono.

Francais: Tout le peuple le remarqua et le trouva bon, comme il trouvait bon tout ce que faisait le roi.
Anglais: And all the people took notice of it, and it pleased them: as whatsoever the king did pleased all the people.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawt kayni sumun kaf wa'a, haysi li ŋaa'a, law ma mulla lumna cuk kuɗ haysiya.
Bulu: Ane bôte bese be nga yene jame te a kañese jam ése njô bôt a nga bo.
Guiziga: Mizli keɗeɗe a sinaka le, yo a hĩyãka le. Naŋ kine, gwat buy maga gar na, mizli ara hĩyãkaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe ngi'i no Daawuda woyri Abineer, ɗum fottani ɓe, ko o waɗi fuu fottani ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe ngi'i no Daawuda woyri Abineer, ɗum fottani ɓe, ko o waɗi fuu fottani ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ zɔka mɔ nɛ wannu dea, ɓɛɛ kpa desee, wen mɔ nɛ wannu dea'i lɛŋ, o bíí kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔaa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ zɔka mɔ nɛ wannu dea, ɓɛɛ kpa desee, wen mɔ nɛ wannu dea'i lɛŋ, o bíí kɔ̧ɔ̧ ɗɔaa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa mbeli keɗepete ba'a keyɛte nda ŋa meghe. Bandanyɛ ne, na mbeli kenakɛ megela wəshi nyi mene maze pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: Nen jar äuy raw koge lay day saara ko lay ga reen do maga wañ joñ no äuy no.

Francais: Tout le peuple et tout Israël comprirent en ce jour que ce n'était point de par le roi qu'on avait fait mourir Abner, fils de Ner.
Anglais: For all the people and all Israel understood that day that it was not of the king to slay Abner the son of Ner.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buur namna sumun kaf hiɗi sa Israyella wi ala, David may vul hagat (tam Yowab) kay ci Abnerɗi.
Bulu: Bôte bese a Israél be nga yeme môs ôte na Abnér e mona Ner a nji ke wôéban amu abendé njô bôt.
Guiziga: Tapasa mizli gar, yo Israyeley gar na, a sinaka le, muc ngi Abner, mangal ngi Ner na, i buy mupula jiviɗ naŋ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyalaade maajum koo moy nder yimɓe Daawuda e nder Isra'iila fuu faami mbarki Abineer iwaay haa laamiiɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyalaade maajum koo moy nder yimɓe Daawuda e nder Isra'iila fuu faami mbarki Abineer iwaay haa laamiiɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wese'i, dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ in o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ iŋa'e, bo nɛ wannu a̧ gbɛɛ Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wese'i, dukbíí nɛ̀ oi-aa lɛŋ in o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ iŋa'e, bo nɛ wannu a̧ gbɛɛ Abnɛr bem ko Nɛr na.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsetse se ŋkɛ nda ɗepete mbeli nyi te hɛɗia Zhəwda le yɛ ŋa ka Israyɛl te vecia shɛ ashɛ meghe nde ndeke nda hweŋkwa kepesle Abnɛr, wəzege ta Nɛr we.
Tupurri: Ngaäan äuy de jar Israyel wo äuy raw wo koge go ti wur sen ni so ga aè ii Abner je ni Nern go mono bay ti jag wañ wa.

Francais: Le roi dit à ses serviteurs: « Ne savez-vous pas qu'un chef, qu'un grand homme est tombé aujourd'hui en Israël?
Anglais: And the king said unto his servants, Know ye not that there is a prince and a great man fallen this day in Israel?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mulla di tam sa sunda valamu: Vaydi kayni, sa ma vok sumuna, sa ma ŋolo mitawa hay Israyel nigi may wi naɗi su?
Bulu: Ane njô bôt a nga jô bebo bisaé bé na ye mi nji yeme na ntômba, mben yʼIsraél ô wuya den?
Guiziga: Buy Davit a ɓa gawla naŋhaya: «Buy, yo mbur madiɗa a diɗ le dana ar hirwuy Israyel na, ki sinaka ta kwa?
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaŋko o wi'i saraaki'en maako: “On paamaay na? Hannde ardiiɗo mawɗo maayi nder Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Kaŋko o wi'i saraaki'en maako: “On paamaay na? Hannde ardiiɗo mawɗo maayi nder Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧ o gasa wi-biro kɔ‘i: «Ɛ́nɛ́ íŋ ndé ŋma gasa wi-duk-ti fee sɛn  Israɛl  sɔsɔɔ na nde?
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ wannu tɔ̧ ha̧ o gasa wi-biro kɔ‘i: «Ɛ́nɛ́ íŋ ndé ŋma gasa wi-duk-ti fee sɛn  Israɛl  sɔsɔɔ na nde?
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke maze sha ka mene slene ta ŋkɛ: «Nahe yɛ keɗepete tse ɓeshi ne, meghe zake, meghea ka Israyɛl nya wəba nde mte na?
Tupurri: Wañ day wii weere joçoçre äen wo gano: Nday bay de koge ga weel biñni, je kluu le' go gesiñ wara äil sir Israyel wa yawla?

Francais: Pour moi, je suis doux, quoiqu'ayant reçu l'onction royale; et ces hommes, les fils de Sarvia, sont plus durs que moi. Que Yahweh rende à qui fait le mal selon le mal qu'il fait! »
Anglais: And I am this day weak, though anointed king; and these men the sons of Zeruiah be too hard for me: the  Lord  shall reward the doer of evil according to his wickedness.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Wulin kayn nan ka tuni mulu, may nan ka maŋay tuwa; sum nisin sa gurona vi Seruyan lakŋi nisi dono suwanu. Sa ma li joona Lawn ma hot wurakam joota valamu.
Bulu: Atek é ngenan me nyô, akôsa bo me ne ñwoʼone mbone ya bo njô bôt; a bôte bete, bone be Séruya, be ne njet a dañe ma. Nti Emien a bulaʼane môt ase a bo abé avalʼane mboon évô wé ô né.
Guiziga: Dana, ko ti taŋ micikiy yi buy kwana, y'anta gidaŋ t'aruŋ. Amma, mizli hanayna, ziri ngi Seruyahay na, taŋ tuwaˀ haɗa avu ya. Amma, anja Buymisemuŋ a wurka mbur misi moˀore weˀ avu moˀore naŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo mi laamiiɗo boo, mi tampuɗo hannde, ngam mi waawaay haɗugo ɓiɓɓe Seruyatu ɓe'e. Caatal maɓɓe salori yam. Jawmiraawo hiito ɓe deydey halleende maɓɓe.”
Fulfulde_DC: Koo mi laamiiɗo boo, mi tampuɗo hannde, ngam mi waawaay haɗugo ɓiɓɓe Seruyatu ɓe'e. Caatal maɓɓe salori yam. Jawmiraawo hiito ɓe deydey halleende maɓɓe.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War kɔ‘m, sɔsɔɔ, kóó nɛ̀ oi nɔ̧́-wan nɛ wa tɛna a zu'm'i, mi nɛ́ ziɓa-wi. O bem ko Sɛruya ŋgaia gan am, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN a̧ dé mɔ ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ɗaŋ ko wi’ɛi.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War kɔ‘m, sɔsɔɔ, kóó nɛ̀ oi nɔ̧́-wan nɛ wa tɛna a zu'm'i, mi nɛ́ ziɓa-wi. O bem ko Sɛruya ŋgaia gan am, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN a̧ dé mɔ ha̧ wi-ɗaŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ ɗaŋ ko wi’ɛi.»
Kapsiki_DC: 'Ya le ghəa ɗa ya tsema nza 'ya kamaze ne, kafefa dewə berete ta ɗa 'ya va berete nya menete nya mbeli nyi, ŋwalea male nya heka mbeli kaSerəwya. Pa Mahwətə le ghəa ŋkɛ ɗate mbeli nyi kempəmte ŋkwa nyi.»
Tupurri: Ndi mbi de kaa noo ti ma hayge wañ, ane ndi bay de coäge wa ëa. Jar ni Seruya sen wo mo haç' äil äaara dañ me tuu. Daga Manwur mo kañ ree ne je hun ti wer hun maga aà joñn mono.

Francais: Lorsque le fils de Saül apprit qu'Abner était mort à Hébron, ses mains furent sans force, et tout Israël fut dans la consternation.
Anglais: And when Saul's son heard that Abner was dead in Hebron, his hands were feeble, and all the Israelites were troubled.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma goora vi Sawul hum ala Abner mitawa hay Hebron, donota valam vat goyo, sum sa Israyel kaf muɗ geɗa.
Bulu: Eyoñe mone Saül a nga wôʼô na Abnér a wuya Ebroñ, mo mé me nga tek a Israél ase a nga ko woñ.
Guiziga: Isebaˀal, mangal ngi Sawul na a cine na, Abner a muc le a Hebroŋ. Mevel a slaŋ, yo mizli Israyeley gar, a ga taŋ gigisl teˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde Isboset ɓii Sawulu nani haala maayde Abineer haa Heburuun, o soofi, Isra'iila'en fuu cakli.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde Isboset ɓii Sawulu nani haala maayde Abineer haa Heburuun, o soofi, Isra'iila'en fuu cakli.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ Isbosɛt bem ko Saul zia'e, Abnɛr fea sɛn Hebrɔŋ, tɛ-a gbina, ɓɛɛ o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ ya yelem.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ Isbosɛt bem ko Saul zia'e, Abnɛr fea sɛn Hebrɔŋ, tɛ-a gbina, ɓɛɛ o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ ya yelem.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ishebal wəzege ta Sawəl, fate nahe Abnɛr kemte kwa Hɛbron. Shaŋe geva ta ŋkɛ kanza le berete, pɛtɛa ka Israyɛl taheta taheta mehele ta nci.
Tupurri: De maga je ni Sawul wo laage ga Abner hu le go Hebroñ mono, eegre äe raw hooge go, Israyel wo äuy caa wo heçeçne go lay.

Francais: Le fils de Saül avait deux chefs de bandes, dont l'un s'appelait Baana, et l'autre Réchab, tous deux fils de Remmon de Béroth, d'entre les fils de Benjamin. Car Béroth est aussi comptée comme faisant partie de Benjamin,
Anglais: And Saul's son had two men that were captains of bands: the name of the one was Baanah, and the name of the other Rechab, the sons of Rimmon a Beerothite, of the children of Benjamin: (for Beeroth also was reckoned to Benjamin:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Is-Boset ka hiɗi sum sara ma' sa tun vok sumuna: Hen yum Baana, hen yum Rekab; nisi si gurona vi Rimmon ma Beerotna, jar gurona vi Benyamin.
Bulu: E mona Saül a nga bili bivete ya minsamba bibaé, jia jôé na Baana, ji évoʼo na Rékab; be mbe bone be Rimôn ya Beérôt, mvôʼô Bényamin.
